verse.content: Yei ne nsɛm a Mose ka kyerɛɛ Israel nyinaa, Yordan agya serɛ soɔ, Araba mpaperɛ so, Suf ntentensoɔ, Paran ne Tofel, Laban, Haserot ne Di-sahab ntam;
ɛfiri Horeb, Seir bepɔ kwan so, kɔ Kades-barnea yɛ dadu dabaako kwan.
Na afe a ɛtɔ so aduanan no, bosome a ɛtɔ so dubaako, bosome no ara da a ɛdi kan no, Mose kasa kyerɛɛ Israelfoɔ no, sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ no sɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ wɔn no nyinaa;
kum a wɔkum Amorifoɔ hene Sihon a ɔte Hesbon ne Basan hene Og a ɔte Astarot wɔ Edrei no akyi;
Yordan agya, Moab asase so na Mose firii aseɛ kyerɛkyerɛɛ mmara yi mu sɛ:
AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ yɛn wɔ Horeb sɛ: Moatena bepɔ yi ho akyɛre dodo,

monnane mo ho ntu nkɔ Amorifoɔ bepɔ ne nsase a ɛbemmɛn ho wɔ Araba mpaperɛ no so, bepɔ so ne mpaperɛ so ne Negeb ne mpoano nyinaa, Kanaanfoɔ asase so ne Lebanon so nkɔduru asukɛseɛ, Asubɔntene Eufrate ho.
Hwɛ, mede asase no mato mo anim; monkɔ nkɔfa asase a AWURADE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ mo nananom, Abraham, Isak ne Yakob, sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn ne wɔn asefoɔ a wɔdi wɔn akyire no.
Na meka mekyerɛɛ mo berɛ no mu sɛ: Me nko ara mentumi menkura mo;
AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ama moadɔɔso, na hwɛ, ɛnnɛ mo dodoɔ te sɛ ɔsoro nsoromma;
AWURADE mo nananom Nyankopɔn mfa no sɛdeɛ moteɛ yi mmɔho apem nka mo ho, na ɔnhyira mo sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ mo no.
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na me nko ara mɛtumi masoa mo ne mo aperedie ho adesoa duruduro yi?
Monyiyi mmarima anyansafoɔ ne animdefoɔ a wɔdɛnso mo mmusuakuo no mu, na memfa wɔn nsisi mo so atitire.
Na mobuaa me sɛ: Asɛm a woaka sɛ yɛnyɛ no yɛ.

Ɛnna mede mo mmusuakuo mu atitire, mmarima anyansafoɔ a wɔdɛnso sisii mo so atitire, apem apem so mpanin ne ɔha ɔha so mpanin ne aduonum aduonum so mpanin ne du du so mpanin ne mo mmusuakuo so ahwɛfoɔ.
Na mehyɛɛ mo atemmufoɔ no mmara berɛ no mu sɛ: Montie mo nuanom ntam nsɛm, na mommu ntɛntenenee onipa ne ne nua ne ne hɔhoɔ ntam.
Monnhwɛ nnipa anim atemmuo mu, montie aketewa sɛ ɔkɛseɛ; monnsuro onipa anim, ɛfiri sɛ atemmuo yɛ Nyankopɔn dea. Na asɛm a ɛyɛ den sene mo na momfa mmrɛ me, na mentie.
Na mehyɛɛ mo nnoɔma a monyɛ no nyinaa ho mmara berɛ no mu.
Na yɛtu firii Horeb, na yɛnante faa ɛserɛ kɛseɛ a ɛso yɛ hu a mohunuiɛ nyinaa so, Amorifoɔ bepɔ kwan so, sɛdeɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ yɛn no, na yɛduruu Kades-barnea.
Na mesee mo sɛ: Moaduru Amorifoɔ bepɔ a AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de rema yɛn no ho.
Hwɛ, AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de asase no ato w’anim. Foro kɔfa, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo nananom Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ woɔ no; nsuro, na mma w’akoma nntu.
Ɛnna mo nyinaa motwe pinii me kaa sɛ: Ma yɛnsoma mmarima nni yɛn anim nkɔsra asase no mma yɛn, na wɔmmɛka kwan ko a yɛbɛfa soɔ ne nkuro a yɛbɛduru soɔ no ho asɛm nkyerɛ yɛn.
Na asɛm no sɔɔ m’ani sɛ, na mefaa mo mu nnipa dummienu, mmusuakuo biara mu nipa baako.
Na wɔdanee wɔn ani foroo bepɔ no, na wɔkɔduruu Eskol subonhwa mu, na wɔsraeɛ.
Na wɔfaa asase no so aba bi kura de siane brɛɛ yɛn; na wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ yɛn bio sɛ: Asase a AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de rema yɛn no yɛ.
Nanso moampɛ sɛ moforɔ, na motee AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anomu asɛm so atua,
na monwiinwii mo ntomadan mu sɛ: Ɔtane so na AWURADE yii yɛn firii Misraim asase soɔ, sɛ ɔde yɛn rebɛhyɛ Amorifoɔ nsa na wɔasɛe yɛn.
Ɛhe na yɛmfa nkorɔ? Yɛn nuanom atu yɛn akoma sɛ: Nnipa no soso na wɔwoware sene yɛn, nkuro no yɛ akɛseɛ a wɔatoto ho afasuo kɔ soro, na bio nso yɛhunuu Anakfoɔ mma no wɔ hɔ.
Na mesee mo sɛ: Mommma mo akoma nntu, na monnsuro wɔn.
AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn a ɔdi mo anim no, ɔno na ɔbɛko ama mo, sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ maa mo Misraim wɔ mo anim no ara,
ne ɛserɛ so a wohunuu sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn kura wo sɛdeɛ onipa kura ne ba, akwan a mofaa soɔ no nyinaa so bɛsii sɛ moduruu ha yi.
Na yei mu nso, moannye AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anni,
nanso ɔno na na ɔdi mo anim ɔkwan soɔ sɛ ɔrekɔsra mo nsrabankyerebea ama mo, ogya mu anadwo, sɛ ɔrekyerɛ mo kwan a momfa soɔ, mununkum mu awia.
Na AWURADE tee mo nsɛm no, na ne bo fuiɛ, na ɔkaa ntam sɛ:
Awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ bɔne yi mu nnipa yi mu biara renhunu asase pa a mekaa ho ntam sɛ mede bɛma mo nananom no!
Gye Yefune ba Kaleb, ɔno na ɔbɛhunu, na ɔno na mede asase a ɔtiaa soɔ no bɛma no ne ne mma, ɛfiri sɛ wadi AWURADE akyi.
Me nso, mo nti AWURADE faa me ho abufuo kaa sɛ: Wo nso, worenkɔ hɔ bi.
Nun ba Yosua a ɔgyina w’anim no, ɔno na ɔbɛduru hɔ; ɔno na hyɛ no den, na ɔno na ɔbɛkyɛ agyapadeɛ no ama Israel.
Na mo mma nketewa a mose wɔbɛyɛ nnommum ne mo mma a nnɛ wɔnnim papa ne bɔne no, wɔn na wɔbɛduru hɔ, wɔn na mede bɛma wɔn na wɔn na wɔbɛdi soɔ.
Na mo deɛ, monnane mo ho ntu nkɔ ɛserɛ so, Mmɛwa Po kwan so.
Ɛnna mobua see me sɛ: Yɛayɛ AWURADE bɔne, yɛn ara yɛbɛforo akɔko sɛdeɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ yɛn no nyinaa. Na mode mo akodeɛ miamiaeɛ no, ɛyɛɛ mo sɛ bepɔ no forɔ yɛ agorɔ.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Ka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Mommforo nnkɔko, na menni mo mu, na moankɔtotɔ mo atamfoɔ anim.
Na mekasa mekyerɛɛ mo, na moantie, na motee AWURADE anomu asɛm atua, na motintim mo anim foroo bepɔ no.
Na Amorifoɔ a wɔte bepɔ no soɔ no firi bɛhyiaa mo na wɔtaa mo sɛdeɛ nwowa yɛ, na wɔkunkum mo Seir kɔduruu Horma.
Na mosane bɛsuu AWURADE anim, na AWURADE antie mo, na wanyɛ aso amma mo.
Ɛnna motenaa Kades dii nna pii, sɛdeɛ nna a mode tenaa hɔ teɛ no.
Ɛnna yɛdanee yɛn ho tuu yɛn kwan kɔɔ ɛserɛ so, Mmɛwa Po kwan so sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me no, na yɛkonton faa Seir bepɔ ho nna pii.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ:
Moakyini bepɔ yi ho akyɛre dodo, monnane mo ho nkyerɛ atifi fam;
na hyɛ ɔman no sɛ: Morebɛtwam mo nuanom Esau mma a wɔte Seir no hyeɛ so, na wɔsuro mo, monhwɛ mo ho yie,
mo ne wɔn nnni aperepereɛ, na meremfa wɔn asase nammɔn baako mpo memma mo, ɛfiri sɛ mede Seir bepɔ mama Esau sɛ n’atenaeɛ.
Momfa sika ntɔ wɔn nkyɛn aduane nni, na nsuo nso momfa sika ntɔ no wɔn nkyɛn nnom;
na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyira wo, wo nsa ano adwuma nyinaa mu, wahunu wo serɛ kɛseɛ yi so nanteɛ yi; mfirinhyia aduanan yi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn adi w’akyi, biribiara nhiaa wo.
Na yɛsianee yɛn nuanom Esau mma a wɔte Seir no ho faa Araba mpaperɛ so kwan so firii Elat ne Esion-geber danee yɛn ho bɛtwaa mu Moab serɛ so kwan so.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nteetee Moab ho, na ɛne wɔn nnni aperepereɛ nnko, na meremma wo wɔn asase no bi nni so, ɛfiri sɛ mede Ar mama Lot mma sɛ wɔnni so.
(Emifoɔ na kane no na wɔte soɔ, ɔman a wɔso na wɔdɔɔso na wɔwoware sɛ Anakfoɔ;
wɔn nso wɔbu wɔn abrane akɛseɛ sɛ Anakfoɔ; Moabfoɔ na ɛfrɛ wɔn Emifoɔ.
Na Seir nso akane no Horifoɔ na na ɛte hɔ, na Esau mma tuu wɔn na wɔsɛee wɔn, wɔn anim, na wɔtenaa wɔn ananmu, sɛdeɛ Israel yɛɛ asase a ɛyɛ wɔn agyapadeɛ a AWURADE de maa wɔn no.)
Afei monsɔre nkɔtwa Sered asuwa. Na yɛtwaa Sered asuwa.

Na mfeɛ dodoɔ a yɛde nante firi Kades-barnea bɛsii sɛ yɛtwaa Sered asuwa no yɛ mfirinhyia aduasa nwɔtwe, bɛsii sɛ akofoɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ no nyinaa wuwuiɛ firii nsraban no mu, sɛdeɛ AWURADE kaa wɔn ntam no.
Na AWURADE nsa nso daa wɔn so sɛ ɔresɛe wɔn afiri nsraban no mu akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛwie sa.
Na akofoɔ no nyinaa saeɛ na wɔwuwu firii ɔman no mu no,
AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ:
Ɛnnɛ worebɛtwam wɔ Ar, Moab hyeɛ so,
na woduru Amon mma hyeɛ so a, nteetee wɔn, anaasɛ ɛne wɔn nnni aperepereɛ, na meremma wo Amon mma asase no bi nni so, ɛfiri sɛ mede mama Lot mma sɛ wɔnni so.
(Wɔbu ɛno nso abrane akɛseɛ asase; abrane akɛseɛ na na ɛte so kane no, na Amonfoɔ frɛ wɔn Samsumim,
ɔman a wɔso na wɔdɔɔso na wɔwoware sɛ Anakfoɔ; na AWURADE sɛee wɔn wɔn anim maa wɔtuu wɔn tenaa wɔn ananmu,
sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ maa Esau mma a wɔte Seir a ɔsɛee Horifoɔ wɔn anim maa wɔtuu wɔn tenaa wɔn ananmu bɛduruu nnɛ yi no.
Na Awifoɔ nso a wɔtenaa nkuraa nkuraa kɔduruu Gasa no, Kaftorim a wɔfiri Kaftor baeɛ no, wɔbɛsɛee wɔn tenaa wɔn ananmu.)
Monsɔre ntu nkɔtwa Arnon subonhwa; hwɛ, mede Hesbonhene Sihon a ɔyɛ Amorini no ne n’asase mahyɛ wo nsa, firi aseɛ di so na ɛne no nni aperepereɛ na monko.
Ɛnnɛ da yi na mɛfiri aseɛ mede wo ho suro ne wo ho hu magu soro nyinaa ase aman a wɔbɛte wo nka soɔ, na wɔn ho apopo na wɔn akoma atu w’anim.
Na mede asomdwoeɛsɛm mefiri Kedemot serɛ so mesomaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔkɔɔ Hesbon hene Sihon nkyɛn kɔkaa sɛ:
Ma mentwam w’asase so; ɔkwan so ara na mɛfa, meremmane nifa anaa benkum.
Tɔn aduane ma me gye sika ma menni, na ma me nsuo nso gye sika ma mennom; me nan hunu na mede bɛtwam,
sɛdeɛ Esau mma a wɔte Seir ne Moabfoɔ a wɔte Ar yɛɛ me no, de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ mɛtwa Yordan makɔ asase a AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de rema yɛn no soɔ.
Na Hesbonhene Sihon amma yɛamfa ne nkyɛn antwam, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn maa no asoɔden honhom na ɔpirim n’akoma, na ɔde no ahyɛ wo nsa sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ nnɛ da yi.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ, mafiri aseɛ mede Sihon ne n’asase mato w’anim, firi aseɛ fa, na di n’asase so.
Ɛnna Sihon firi bɛhyiaa yɛn, ɔno ne ne man nyinaa, sɛ ɔne yɛn rebɛko wɔ Yahas.
Na AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de no hyɛɛ yɛn nsa, na yɛkunkum no ne ne mma ne ne man nyinaa.
Na yɛfaa ne nkuro nyinaa saa berɛ no, na yɛsɛee nkuro no nyinaa pasapasa, mmarima ne mmaa ne mmɔfra, yɛannya wɔn mu fua mpo,
gye afieboa nko na yɛfom wɔn faeɛ, ɛne nkuro a yɛfaeɛ no mu asadeɛ.
Ɛfiri Aroer a ɛda Arnon subonhwa ano ne kuro a ɛda subonhwa no mu no so de kɔsi Gilead, kuro biara nni hɔ a na ɛyɛ den sene yɛn; AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de ne nyinaa hyɛɛ yɛn nsa.
Gye Amon mma asase no nko ho na woantwe ampini; Yabok subonhwa nkyɛn mu nyinaa ne mmepɔ no so nkuro ne baabiara a AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn amma yɛn ho kwan no.
Ɛnna yɛdanee yɛn ani foro kɔɔ Basan kwan soɔ; na Basan hene Og firi bɛhyiaa yɛn, ɔno ne ne man nyinaa ne yɛn bɛkoe wɔ Edrei.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Nsuro no, na mede ɔne ne man nyinaa ne n’asase mahyɛ wo nsa, sɛ yɛ no sɛdeɛ woyɛɛ Amorifoɔ hene Sihon a ɔtenaa Hesbon no.
Na AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de Basan hene Og nso ne ne man nyinaa hyɛɛ yɛn nsa, na yɛkumm wɔn kɔsii sɛ wɔn mu fua mpo anka amma no.
Na yɛfaa ne nkuro nyinaa, berɛ no mu; kuro biara nni hɔ a yɛannye wɔn nsam; nkuro aduosia, Argob asase nyinaa, Og ahennie a ɛwɔ Basan.
Yeinom nyinaa yɛ nkuro a ɛho wɔ afasuo atenten, aponkɛseɛ, ne adaban; ɛsono nkuraa a ɛdɔɔso bebree no.
Na yɛsɛee wɔn pasapasa sɛdeɛ yɛyɛɛ Hesbon hene Sihon no, yɛsɛee nkuro no ne emu mmarima, mmaa ne mmɔfra nyinaa pasapasa.
Na afieboa nyinaa ne nkuro no mu asadeɛ deɛ, yɛfom fae.
Na yɛgyee asase no firii Amorifoɔ ahemfo baanu a wɔwɔ Yordan agya no nsam, saa berɛ no, ɛfiri Arnon subonhwa mu kɔsi Hermon bepɔ ho,
(Sidonfoɔ frɛ Hermon sɛ Sirion, na Amorifoɔ frɛ no Senir),
asaseta so nkuro nyinaa ne Gilead nyinaa ne Basan nyinaa kɔduru Salka ne Edrei, Basanhene Og ahennie no nkuro.
(Na Basanhene Og nko na aka wɔ abrane akɛseɛ nkaeɛ no mu. Hwɛ, ne mpa a ɛyɛ dadeɛ mpa, ɛnsi Amon mma Raba anaa? Ne tentene basafa nan ne fa, na ne tɛtrɛtɛ basafa mmienu, sɛdeɛ onipa basafa teɛ.)
Na yɛfaa asase yi saa berɛ no; ɛfiri Aroer a ɛda Arnon subonhwa mu ne Gilead bepɔ fa ne ne nkuro na mede memaa Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ;
na Gilead nkaeɛ ne Basan nyinaa, Og man a ɛyɛ Argob asase nyinaa, mede maa Manase abusuakuo fa. (Saa Basan no nyinaa na wɔfrɛ no abrane akɛseɛ asase.
Manase ba Yair faa Argob asase no nyinaa a ɛne Basan kɔsii Gesurfoɔ ne Maakatfoɔ hyeɛ so, na ɔde ne din too asase no frɛɛ no Hawot-yair de bɛsi nnɛ da yi.)
Na mede Gilead maa Makir.
Na Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ no, memaa wɔn Gilead fa bi, ɛkɔduru Arnon subonhwa ho a subonhwa no mfimfini ne ɛhyeɛ, de kɔpem Yabok subonhwa no, Amon mma hyeɛ so,
Araba mpaperɛ so ne Yordan ne ɛho asase, ɛfiri Kineret kɔsi Araba mpaperɛ so po a ɛne Nkyene Po no ano wɔ Pisga bepɔ ase apueeɛ fam.
Na mehyɛɛ mo saa berɛ no sɛ: AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de asase yi ama mo sɛ monni so, mo akofoɔ nyinaa mmia ntwam nni mo nuanom Israelfoɔ anim;
mo yerenom ne mo mma ne mo mmoa deɛ, menim sɛ mowɔ mmoa pii, wɔntena mo nkuro a mede mama mo no mu;
nkɔsi sɛ AWURADE bɛma mo nuanom ahome sɛ mo, na wɔn nso wɔadi asase a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de rema wɔn Yordan agya no so, ansa na moasane aba mo agyapadeɛ a mede mama mo no so.
Na Yosua nso, mehyɛɛ no saa berɛ no sɛ: W’ani ahunu deɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de yɛɛ ahemfo baanu yi nyinaa: Saa ara nso na AWURADE bɛyɛ ahennie a woretwam akɔ hɔ nyinaa;
monnsuro wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn na ɔbɛko ama mo.
Na mesrɛɛ AWURADE saa berɛ no sɛ:
AWURADE Nyankopɔn, wo na woafiri aseɛ de wo kɛseyɛ ne wo nsa a ɛyɛ den no akyerɛ w’akoa, na onyame bɛn na ɔwɔ soro anaa asase soɔ a ɔbɛtumi ayɛ wo nnwuma ne wo mmaninneɛ yi bie?
Mesrɛ wo, ma mentwa menkɔhwɛ asase pa a ɛwɔ Yordan agya no, bepɔ fɛfɛ no ne Lebanon.
Nanso mo nti AWURADE bo fuu me, na wantie me; na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Ɛdɔɔso ma wo, nkɔ so ne me nkasa asɛm yi ho bio.
Foro kɔ Pisga so, na ma w’ani so hwɛ atɔeɛ ne atifi fam ne anafoɔ ne apueeɛ, na fa w’ani hwɛ, na Yordan yi deɛ, worentwa.
Na hyɛ Yosua yie, na hyɛ no den na hyɛ no aboɔduro, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na ɔbɛdi ɔman yi anim akyɛ asase a wobɛhunu no mu ama wɔn.
Na yɛtenaa bonhwa no mu, Bet-peor ntentensoɔ.
Na afei, Israel, tie ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a mekyerɛ mo sɛ monyɛ no, na moanya nkwa na moakɔ akɔfa asase a AWURADE mo nananom Nyankopɔn de rema mo no.
Mommfa hwee nnka asɛm a merehyɛ mo yi ho, nanso monnyi mu biribi, na moadi AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ mo yi so.
Mo ani ahunu deɛ Baal-peor nti AWURADE yɛeɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔdii Baal-peor akyire nyinaa AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn sɛee wɔn firii mo mu;
na mo a mobataa AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ho no, mo nyinaa te ase nnɛ.
Hwɛ, merekyerɛ mo ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE me Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ me no sɛ monyɛ saa, wɔ asase a morekɔ soɔ akɔfa no so.
Enti monni so na monyɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɛno ne mo nyansa ne mo nhunumu, aman a wɔbɛte ahyɛdeɛ yi nyinaa anim, na wɔbɛka sɛ: Ampa, ɔman anyansafoɔ ne nhunumufoɔ ne ɔman kɛseɛ yi!
Na ɔman kɛseɛ bɛn na wɔwɔ onyame bi a ɔbɛn wɔn sɛdeɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛn yɛn, frɛ a yɛfrɛ no no nyinaa mu yi?
Na ɔman kɛseɛ bɛn na ɛwɔ ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ tenenee sɛ mmara a mede meresi mo anim nnɛ yi nyinaa?
Monhwɛ mo ho yie, na monhwɛ mo kra nso so yie, na mo werɛ amfiri nsɛm a mo ani ahunu no, na mo nkwa nna nyinaa mu amfiri mo akoma mu, na ma mo mma ne mo asefoɔ nhunu.

Ɛda a na wogyina AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim, Horeb soɔ no na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Boaboa ɔman no ano ma me, na memma wɔntie me nsɛm a wɔnsua mfa nsuro me, nna a wɔde te aseɛ, asase soɔ nyinaa, na wɔmfa nkyerɛ wɔn mma:
Na motwe pini bɛgyinaa bepɔ no ase, berɛ a na ogya redɛre de wisie kumɔnn rekɔ soro tɔnn, bepɔ no so, mununkum ne esum kabii mu.
Na AWURADE firi ogya no mu kasa kyerɛɛ mo; sɛdeɛ nsɛm no teɛ no, mo ara motee, na ne tebea bi na moanhunu anka ɛnne no ho.
Na ɔkaa n’apam a ɔhyɛɛ mo sɛ monyɛ no kyerɛɛ mo, mmara nsɛm du no, na ɔtwerɛɛ wɔ aboɔpono mmienu so.
Na me nso AWURADE hyɛɛ me berɛ no mu sɛ menkyerɛ mo ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a monyɛ, asase a moretwam akɔfa no so.
Enti monhwɛ mo kra so yie, ɛfiri sɛ moanhunu tebea biara da no a AWURADE firi ogya no mu kasa kyerɛɛ mo Horeb soɔ no.
Na moanni asɛmmɔne ankɔyɛ ohoni a wɔasene amfa, adeɛ biara tebea, ɔbarima anaa ɔbaa nsɛsoɔ,
asase so aboa biara nsɛsoɔ, atakraboa a ɔtu wiem nsɛsoɔ,
adeɛ biara a ɛwea fam nsɛsoɔ, apataa biara a ɔwɔ nsuo mu, asase ase nsɛsoɔ.
Na woamma w’ani so ankyerɛ soro anhwɛ owia ne ɔsrane ne nsoromma, ɔsoro asafo nyinaa, na antwe wo ankɔsɔre wɔn ansom wɔn, nnoɔma a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn akyekyɛ ama wiase amanaman nyinaa no.
Na mo deɛ, AWURADE na wayi mo afiri dadeɛ fononoo mu, afiri Misraim sɛ mommɛyɛ n’agyapadeɛ sɛdeɛ moteɛ nnɛ da yi.
Na mo nti AWURADE nyaa me abufuo, na ɔkaa ntam sɛ merentwa Yordan na merenkɔ asase pa a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ di soɔ no so;
na me deɛ, merebɛwu asase yi so, merentwa Yordan, na mo na mobɛtwa akɔfa asase pa no.
Monhwɛ mo ho yie na mo werɛ amfiri AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn apam a ɔne mo pameeɛ no, na moanyɛ ohoni a ɛyɛ biribiara a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn abara woɔ nsɛsoɔ amfa.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn yɛ ogya a ɛhyeɛ, Onyankopɔn ninkufoɔ.
Sɛ mowo mma na mo mma nso wo, na mokyɛre asase no so, na modi asɛmmɔne yɛ ohoni, adeɛ biara tebea, na moyɛ deɛ ɛnyɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anim de huru ne bo a,
ɛnnɛ mefrɛ ɔsoro ne asase sɛ ɛmmɛdi mo adanseɛ sɛ yera na mobɛyera ntɛm soɔ afiri asase a moretwa Yordan akɔfa no so, mo nna renkyɛre so, na mmom sɛeɛ na mobɛsɛe pasapasa.
Na AWURADE bɛpansam mo agu amanaman mu, na ɛbɛka mo mu kakraa bi wɔ wiase aman a AWURADE de mo bɛkɔ hɔ no mu;
na ɛhɔ na mobɛsom anyame a ɛyɛ onipa nsa ano adwuma, nnua ne aboɔ a ɛnhunu adeɛ na ɛnte asɛm na ɛnnidie na ɛnhua adeɛ nhwɛ no.
Na ɛhɔ nso mobɛhwehwɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn, na sɛ mode mo akoma nyinaa ne mo kra nyinaa hwehwɛ n’akyiri kwan a, mobɛhu no.
Sɛ mokɔ ahohiahia mu na nnoɔma yi nyinaa to mo nna a ɛdi akyire no mu a, mobɛsane aba AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn abɛtie ne nne;
na AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn yɛ Onyankopɔn mmɔborɔhunufoɔ, ɔrempa mo na ɔrensɛe mo, na ne werɛ remfiri mo nananom apam a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wɔn no.
Na mommu nkɔmpɔ nhwɛ mo akyi, ɛfiri da a Onyankopɔn bɔɔ onipa baa asase soɔ, na mommisa mfiri soro ano kɔpem ano, sɛ wɔayɛ biribi a ɛte sɛ asɛnkɛseɛ yi, anaasɛ wɔate biribi sɛ ɛno,
sɛ ɔman bi ate Nyankopɔn nne sɛ ɛfiri ogya mu rekasa, sɛdeɛ woateɛ yi, na wɔanya nkwa anaa?

Anaasɛ onyame bi asɔ ahwɛ pɛn sɛ ɔbɛkɔ akɔyi ɔman bi afiri ɔman bi mu afa wɔ sɔhwɛ ahodoɔ, nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ ne akodie ne nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a watene ne ahodwirideɛ akɛseɛ mu, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn yɛ maa mo Misraim wɔ mo anim no anaa?
Wo deɛ, wɔama woahunu, na woahunu sɛ AWURADE ne Onyankopɔn a obi nni hɔ nka ne ho.
Ɔfiri soro ma wotee ne nne sɛ ɔretenetene woɔ, na asase so nso wama woahunu ne gya kɛseɛ no, na woate ne nsɛm afiri ogya mu.
Ɛsiane sɛ ɔdɔ wo nananom nti, wayi wɔn asefoɔ a ɛdi wɔn akyire, na ɔde n’anim ne ne tumi kɛseɛ ayi wo afiri Misraim,
sɛ ɔrebɛtu aman a wɔso na wɔyɛ den sene woɔ afiri w’anim, sɛ ɔde wo rekɔ hɔ de wɔn asase akɔma wo sɛ awunnyadeɛ, sɛdeɛ ɛte nnɛ da yi.
Enti hunu nnɛ, na fa sie w’akoma mu, sɛ AWURADE ne Onyankopɔn wɔ ɔsoro ne asase so na obi nni hɔ bio.
Na di n’ahyɛdeɛ ne ne mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi so, na awie wo ne wo mma a wɔdi w’akyire yie, na woakye wɔ asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so daa nyinaa.
Ɛno na Mose yiyii nkuro mmiɛnsa, Yordan agya deɛ owia pue,
sɛ onipakumfoɔ a ɔkum ne yɔnko nsapa mu na ɔntane no dada no nnwane nkɔ hɔ, na ɔdwane kɔ nkuro yi baako mu a, wanya nkwa:
Ɔyii Beser wɔ ɛserɛ so ne asaseta so maa Rubenfoɔ, ne Ramot wɔ Gilead maa Gadfoɔ, ne Golan wɔ Basan maa Manasefoɔ.
Na yei ne mmara a Mose de too Israelfoɔ no anim.
Yeinom ne adansesɛm ne ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a Israelfoɔ firii Misraim baeɛ no, Mose ka kyerɛɛ wɔn
Yordan agya, bonhwa no mu, Bet-peor ntentensoɔ, Amorifoɔ hene Sihon a ɔtenaa Hesbon a Mose ne Israelfoɔ firi Misraim baeɛ no, wɔkum no no asase so.
Na wɔfaa n’asase ne Basan hene Og asase, Amorifoɔ ahemfo baanu a wɔtenatenaa Yordan agya, apueeɛ fam no, asase,
ɛfiri Areor a ɛda Arnon subonhwa ano kɔsi Sion bepɔ (a ɛne Hermon ho),
ne Araba mpaperɛ a ɛda Yordan agya apueeɛ no nyinaa kɔduru Araba mpaperɛ so ɛpo no ano wɔ Pisga ase.
Na Mose frɛɛ Israel nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Israel, montie ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a mereka magu mo aso mu nnɛ yi, na monsua, na monni so nyɛ.
AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn ne yɛn yɛɛ apam Horeb so;
ɛnyɛ yɛn nananom na AWURADE ne wɔn pam apam yi, na ɛyɛ yɛn a ɛnnɛ yɛn nyinaa tete aseɛ yi ara.
AWURADE firi ogya no mu bepɔ no ho ne mo dii nhwɛanim na ɔkasaeɛ.
Me deɛ, na megyina AWURADE ne mo ntam saa berɛ no, sɛ merekyerɛ mo AWURADE asɛm, ɛfiri sɛ mosuroo ogya no anim na moamforo bepɔ no. Na ɔkaa sɛ:
Mene AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn a meyii wo firii Misraim asase soɔ, nkoafie mu no.
Nnya anyame afoforɔ nka me ho.
Nyɛ ohoni, adeɛ a ɛwɔ wiem ɔsoro ne deɛ ɛwɔ asase so ɛfam ne deɛ ɛwɔ nsuo mu asase ase suban mfa; nkoto wɔn na nsom wɔn.
Na me AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn meyɛ Onyankopɔn ninkufoɔ a metua nananom amumuyɛ so ka mefa mma soɔ kɔsi awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mmiɛnsa ne nnan a wɔtane me soɔ,
na meyɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mpempem a wɔdɔ me na wɔdi me mmara nsɛm so adɔeɛ.
Mmɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn din kwa, na AWURADE remma deɛ ɔbɔ ne din kwa ho nyɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ.
Di homeda na hwɛ yɛ no kronkron, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ woɔ no.
Nnansia na yɛ adwuma, na yɛ w’adeɛ nyinaa;

na ɛda a ɛtɔ so nson no yɛ homeda ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, nyɛ adwuma biara, wo ne wo babarima ne wo babaa, ne w’akoa ne w’afenaa, ne wo nantwie ne w’afunumu ne wo mmoa nyinaa, ne wo hɔhoɔ a ɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu, na w’akoa ne w’afenaa ahome sɛ wo.
Na kae sɛ woyɛɛ akoa Misraim asase so, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a wɔatene mu yii wo firii hɔ, enti na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛ wo sɛ di homeda no.
Di w’agya ne wo na ni, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ woɔ no, na wo nna aware na asi wo yie, asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so.
Nni awu.
Na nsɛe awadeɛ.
Na mmɔ korɔno.
Na nni wo yɔnko ho adansekurumu.
Na mma wo kɔn nnɔ wo yɔnko yere. Na mma w’ani mmmere wo yɔnko fie, n’asase ne n’akoa ne n’afenaa, ne nantwie ne n’afunumu ne biribiara a ɛyɛ wo yɔnko dea.
Nsɛm yi na AWURADE firi ogya mununkum ne esum kabii no mu de nne kɛseɛ ka kyerɛɛ mo badwa nyinaa, bepɔ no soɔ, na wamfa bi anka ho; na ɔtwerɛɛ no aboɔpono mmienu so de maa me.
Na motee ɛnne no firi esum no mu na bepɔ no redɛre no, motwe pinii me nkyɛn, mo mmusuakuo mu atitire nyinaa ne mo mpanimfoɔ
bɛkaa sɛ: Hwɛ, AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn ama yɛahunu n’animuonyam ne ne kɛseyɛ, na yɛate ne nne afiri ogya no mu, ɛnnɛ da yi na yɛahunu sɛ Onyankopɔn ne onipa kasa nanso ɔnya nkwa.
Na afei, adɛn nti na yɛnwuo? Ɛfiri sɛ ogya kɛseɛ yi rebɛhye yɛn. Sɛ yɛte AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn nne bio a, yɛbɛwuwu.
Na honam nyinaa mu hwan na wate Nyankopɔn teasefoɔ no nne sɛ ɛrekasa firi ogya mu, sɛ yɛn, na wanya nkwa?
Wo na twe pini hɔ na tie deɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛka nyinaa, na bɛka yɛn deɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛka akyerɛ woɔ nyinaa, na yɛbɛtie na yɛayɛ.
Na morekasa akyerɛ me no, AWURADE tee mo nsɛm no, na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Mate ɔman yi nsɛm a wɔaka akyerɛ woɔ no, deɛ wɔaka nyinaa, wɔaka no yie.
O, sɛ anka wɔbɛnya akoma a ɛte seyie na wɔde asuro me adi me mmara nsɛm so nna nyinaa, na asi wɔn ne wɔn mma yie daa ɛ!
Kɔ na kɔka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Monsane nkɔ mo ntomadan mu.
Na wo deɛ, gyina me nkyɛn ha, na menka mmara nsɛm ne ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a wobɛkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn no nyinaa menkyerɛ wo na wɔnyɛ wɔ asase a mede merema wɔn sɛ wɔmfa no so.
Enti monhwɛ na monyɛ sɛdeɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ mo no; mommmane nifa anaa benkum;
ɔkwan a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ mo no nyinaa so na monnanteɛ na moanya nkwa, na asi mo yie, na mo nna aware asase a morekɔnya no so.
Na yei ne mmara nsɛm, ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ sɛ wɔnkyerɛkyerɛ mo na monyɛ asase a moretwam akɔfa no soɔ,
na woasuro AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn adi n’ahyɛdeɛ ne ne mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ woɔ yi nyinaa so, wo ne wo ba ne wo ba ba, wo nkwa nna nyinaa, na wo nna aware.
Enti, Israel, tie, na hwɛ yɛ, na asi wo yie, na woadɔɔso pii, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo nananom Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ woɔ no, asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene soɔ no so.
Israel, tie, AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ AWURADE koro.
Na fa w’akoma nyinaa ne wo kra nyinaa ne w’ahoɔden nyinaa dɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn.
Na nsɛm yi a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nna w’akoma so;
na fa kyerɛkyerɛ wo mma yie, na kasa ho, w’afitena mu ne wo kwan so nanteɛ mu ne wo nna mu ne wo sɔreɛ mu;
na fa yɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ kyekyere wo nsa, na ɛnyɛ w’aniwa ntam nkaeɛ abotire;
na twerɛ gu wo fie aponnwa ho ne w’aponkɛseɛ so.
Na sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nya de wo duru asase a ɔkaa wo nananom Abraham, Isak ne Yakob ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma woɔ no so, nkuro akɛseɛ a ɛyɛ fɛ a ɛnyɛ wo na wokyekyereeɛ,
ne adan a nnepa nyinaa ayɛ no amaama a ɛnyɛ wo na wode hyehyɛɛ mu, ne mmura a wɔatutuo a ɛnyɛ wo na wotutuiɛ, bobe nturo ne ngodua nturo a ɛnyɛ wo na wotetɛeɛ, na sɛ wodidi mee a,
hwɛ yie na wo werɛ amfiri AWURADE a ɔyii wo Misraim asase so firii nkoafie mu no:
AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn na suro no, na ɔno na som no, na ne din ho ntam na ka;
monnni anyame foforɔ a wɔfiri amanaman a wɔgugu mo ho no anyame no akyi;
na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ wo mu no yɛ Onyankopɔn ninkufoɔ, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn abufuo annɛre antia wo, na wansɛe wo amfiri asase ani.
Monnsɔ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn nnhwɛ, sɛdeɛ mosɔɔ no hwɛɛ Masa hɔ no;
monni AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm ne n’adansesɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ a wahyɛ mo no so pɛpɛɛpɛ;
na yɛ deɛ ɛtene na ɛyɛ AWURADE ani soɔ, na asi wo yie, na woakɔ akɔfa asase pa a AWURADE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wo nananom no,
na watu w’atamfo nyinaa afiri w’anim, sɛdeɛ AWURADE kaeɛ no.
Sɛ ɔkyena bi, wo ba bisa wo sɛ: Adansesɛm ne ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ bɛn na AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn de hyɛɛ mo yi?
Ka kyerɛ wo ba no sɛ: Na anka yɛyɛ Farao nkoa Misraim, na AWURADE de nsa a ɛyɛ den yii yɛn firii Misraim;
na AWURADE maa nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ akɛseɛ a ɛyɛ hu baa Misraim, Farao ne ne fie nyinaa so wɔ yɛn anim;
na yɛn deɛ, ɔyii yɛn firii hɔ sɛ ɔde yɛn reba de asase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ yɛn nananom no abɛma yɛn.
Na AWURADE hyɛɛ yɛn sɛ yɛnyɛ ahyɛdeɛ yi nyinaa na yɛnsuro AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn, na ɛnsi yɛn yie nna nyinaa, na ɔmma yɛnnya nkwa, sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ nnɛ yi;
na sɛ yɛhwɛ di mmara nsɛm yi nyinaa so, AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn anim, sɛdeɛ ɔhyɛɛ yɛn no a, ɛbɛyɛ yɛn ateneneefoɔ.

Sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wo duru asase a worekɔ akɔfa no so, na ɔpamo amanaman pii firi w’anim, Hetifoɔ, Girgasifoɔ, Amorifoɔ, Kanaanfoɔ, Perisifoɔ, Hewifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ, aman nson a wɔdɔɔso na wɔn ho yɛ den sene woɔ,
na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn yi wɔn ma wo ma woku wɔn a, ɛnneɛ sɛe wɔn pasapasa; wo ne wɔn mmpam, na nhu wɔn mmɔbɔ;
na ɛne wɔn nnni ayewareɛ, mfa wo mmammaa mma wɔn mma, nso nnye wɔn mmammaa mma wo mma awareɛ.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛdane wo mma ani afiri m’akyi, na wɔasom anyame foforɔ, na AWURADE bo afu mo, na wasɛe wo ntɛm.
Na mmom sɛ monyɛ wɔn nie: Monnwiridwiri wɔn afɔrebukyia, na mommubu wɔn aboɔ adum, na montwitwa wɔn abosompɔ ngu, na momfa ogya nhye wɔn ahoni.
Na mo yɛ ɔman kronkron ma AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn; mo na AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ayi mo sɛ mommɛyɛ ɔman a wafa ayɛ ne dea wɔ aman a ɛwɔ asase so nyinaa mu.
Ɛnyɛ mo dodoɔ a ɛsene aman nyinaa nti na AWURADE de ne ho abɔ mo ho na wayi mo, ɛfiri sɛ mo na mosua aman nyinaa mu.
Na ɛsiane sɛ AWURADE dɔ mo na ɔdi ne ntam a ɔkaa mo nananom no soɔ nti na ɔde nsa a ɛyɛ den yii mo, na ɔgyee mo firii nkoafie firii Misraimhene Farao nsam.
Enti hunu sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn no, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn, — Onyankopɔn nokwafoɔ a ɔkora apam ne adɔeɛ ma wɔn a wɔdɔ no na wɔdi ne mmara nsɛm so kɔsi awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ apem soɔ,
na ɔtua wɔn a wɔtane no ka wɔ wɔn anim na ɔsɛe wɔn; ɔnyɛ nyaa mma deɛ ɔtane no, ɔbɛtua no ka wɔ n’anim.
Enti di mmara nsɛm ne atemmudeɛ a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi so, na yɛ.
Na sɛ motie atemmudeɛ yi na modi so yɛ a, AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nso bɛdi apam ne adɔeɛ a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wo nananom no so ama wo,

na wadɔ wo ahyira wo ama woadɔre, na wahyira wo yafunu mu aba ne w’asase so aba, w’aburoo ne wo nsa ne wo ngo ne w’anantwie mma ne wo nnwan mma, asase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wo nananom sɛ ɔde bɛma woɔ no so.
Wɔbɛhyira wo asene aman nyinaa; ɔbarima anaa ɔbaa, anaa w’afieboa renyɛ obonini wɔ wo mu.
Na AWURADE bɛyi yadeɛ nyinaa afiri wo so, na ɔremfa Misraim yadeɛ bɔne a wonim no biara nto wo so, na ɔde bɛto wɔn a wɔtane woɔ nyinaa so.
Na sɛe aman a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wɔn bɛma woɔ no nyinaa; mma w’ani nnhu wɔn mmɔbɔ, na nsom wɔn anyame, ɛfiri sɛ ɛno bɛyɛ fidie ama wo.
Sɛ wose no w’akoma mu sɛ: Amanaman yi dɔɔso sene me, mɛyɛ dɛn na matumi matu wɔn?
Nsuro wɔn, na kae deɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn yɛɛ Farao ne Misraim nyinaa,
sɔhwɛ akɛseɛ a w’ani hunuiɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ ne nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a watene mu a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de yii woɔ no; saa na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛyɛ aman a wosuro wɔn no nyinaa.
Nkotokurodu nso na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛsoma ama wɔakɔ wɔn mu akɔsi sɛ wɔn a wɔaka na wɔahunta no bɛsɛe w’anim.
Mma wɔn anim nnyɛ wo hu, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn wɔ wo mu, Onyankopɔn kɛseɛ a ne ho yɛ hu ne no.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛpamo amanaman yi afiri w’anim nkakrankakra; nsɛe wɔn prɛko, na ewiram mmoa annɔɔso wo so.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wɔn bɛhyɛ wo nsa, na ɔbɛma ahodwirie kɛseɛ aba wɔn mu akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsɛeɛ.
Na ɔde wɔn ahemfo bɛhyɛ wo nsa, na woasɛe wɔn din afiri wiase; obiara rentumi nnyina w’anim de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ wobɛsɛe wɔn.
Wɔn anyame ahoni no, momfa ogya nhye; mma w’ani mmmere ɛho dwetɛ ne sika, na mfa bi, na ansum wo fidie, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn akyiwadeɛ.
Na mfa akyiwadeɛ nkɔ wo fie, na woanyɛ abusudeɛ sɛ ɛno; ma no nyɛ wo tane, na kyi, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ abusudeɛ.
Mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi nyinaa monhwɛ nyɛ, na moanya nkwa, na moadɔre, na moakɔ akɔfa asase a AWURADE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ mo nananom no adi so.
Na kae kwan a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn maa wonantee so mfirinhyia aduanan yi ɛserɛ soɔ no nyinaa, sɛ ɔrebrɛ wo ase asɔ wo ahwɛ, na wahunu deɛ ɛwɔ w’akoma mu, sɛ wobɛdi ne mmara nsɛm so anaasɛ worenni so.

Na ɔbrɛɛ wo ase maa ɛkɔm dee wo, na ɔde mana a wonnim na wo nananom nso nnim maa wo diiɛ, na wama woahunu sɛ, ɛnyɛ aduane nko so na onipa nam bɛtena aseɛ, na adeɛ biara a ɛfiri AWURADE anomu so na onipa nam tena aseɛ.
Wo ntoma ansu wo ho, na wo nan anhonhon mfirinhyia aduanan yi mu.
Na hunu no w’akoma mu sɛ, sɛdeɛ onipa tea ne ba no, saa ara na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn tea woɔ.
Enti di AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so, sɛ wobɛnante n’akwan soɔ na woasuro no.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wo rekɔ asase pa so, asase a ɛso wɔ nsubɔntene, nsuo aniwa ne atareɛ a ɛfifiri mmonhwa ne mmepɔ mu sene,
asase a ayuo ne atokoɔ ne bobe ne borɔdɔma ne atoaa wɔ soɔ, asase a ɛso wɔ ngodua ne ɛwoɔ,
asase a worenni so aduane na, na biribiara renhia wo wɔ soɔ, asase a n’aboɔ yɛ dadeɛ, na wɔbɛtu kɔbere afiri ne mmepɔ mu.
Na sɛ wodidi mee a, hyira AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, asase pa a ɔde ama woɔ no nti.
Hwɛ yie na wo werɛ amfiri AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn sɛ worenni ne mmara nsɛm ne n’atemmudeɛ ne n’ahyɛdeɛ a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi soɔ;
na sɛ wodidi mee na wosisi adan pa tena mu,
na w’anantwie ne wo nnwan dɔre, na wo dwetɛ ne wo sika dɔɔso ma wo, na adeɛ a wowɔ nyinaa dɔɔso a,
hwɛ yie na w’akoma amma ne ho so, na wo werɛ amfiri AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔyii wo Misraim asase so firii nkoa fie no;
ɔno na ɔdii w’anim de wo faa ɛserɛ kɛseɛ a awɔ a wɔn ano wɔ borɔ ne anyanyankyerɛ wɔ, ne nkyɛkyerɛ a nsuo nni hɔ so; ɔyii nsuo firii ɔbohemmaa botan mu maa wo;
ɔde mana a wo nananom nnim maa wodii wɔ ɛserɛ so, sɛ ɔrebrɛ wo aseɛ na wasɔ wo ahwɛ, na awieeɛ no, wayɛ wo yie,
na woanka no w’akoma mu sɛ: M’ahoɔden ne me nsa den na ama manya ahonyadeɛ yi,
na mmom kae AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na ɔno na ɔma wo ahoɔden a wode nya wo ho, na wama n’apam a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wo nananom no atim sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ nnɛ yi.
Na sɛ wo werɛ firi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na wokɔdi anyame foforɔ akyi som wɔn na wosɔre wɔn a, medi wo adanseɛ nnɛ, sɛ sɛeɛ na mobɛsɛeɛ.
Sɛ amanaman a AWURADE sɛe wɔn firi mo anim no, saa ara na mobɛsɛeɛ, ɛfiri sɛ moantie AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn nne.
Israel, tie! Worebɛtwa Yordan nnɛ akɔ akɔtu amanaman a wɔsoso na wɔn ho yɛ den sene woɔ, afa nkuro akɛseɛ a wɔatoto ho afasuo akɔ soro,
ɔman kɛseɛ a wɔwowareɛ, Anakfoɔ mma a woni wɔn na woate wɔn ho asɛm sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛgyina Anak mma anim?
Na hunu nnɛ sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ne deɛ ɔdi w’anim retwa, sɛ ogya a ɛhyeɛ; ɔno na ɔbɛsɛe wɔn, na wabrɛ wɔn ase, w’anim, na watu wɔn asɛe wɔn ntɛm, sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ woɔ no.
Sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn tu wɔn firi w’anim gu a, nka no w’akoma mu sɛ: Me tenenee nti na AWURADE de me baa sɛ memmɛfa asase yi; na amanaman yi abɔnefosɛm nti na AWURADE retu wɔn afiri w’anim.

Ɛnyɛ wo tenenee ne w’akoma a ɛtene nti na worekɔ akɔfa wɔn asase, na mmom amanaman yi abɔnefosɛm nti na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn retu wɔn afiri w’anim, na wama asɛm a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ wo nananom, Abraham, Isak ne Yakob no atim.
Enti hunu sɛ ɛnyɛ wo tenenee nti na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de asase pa yi rema wo sɛ di soɔ, na ɔman a wɔn kɔn asene ne wo.
Kae na mma wo werɛ mmfi, sɛdeɛ wohyɛɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn abufuo ɛserɛ soɔ no; ɛfiri da a wofirii Misraim asase soɔ de bɛsii sɛ mobaa ha yi, mote ne so atua.
Na Horeb nso mohyɛɛ AWURADE abufuo, na ɛmaa ne bo fuu mo sɛ anka ɔbɛsɛe mo;
ɛberɛ a meforoo bepɔ no sɛ merekɔgye aboɔpono, apam a AWURADE ne mo pameeɛ no apono no, medii bepɔ no so adaduanan awia ne anadwo, mannidi na mannom;
na AWURADE maa me aboɔpono mmienu a wɔde Nyankopɔn nsateaa twerɛeɛ a nsɛm a AWURADE firii ogya mu wɔ bepɔ no so ne mo kaa no dwabɔ da no nyinaa wɔ soɔ.
Na adaduanan awia ne anadwo no wiee duro no, AWURADE de aboɔpono mmienu, apam apono no, maa me,
na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Sɔre siane firi ha ntɛm, na ɔman a wokɔyii wɔn firii Misraim no adi asɛmmɔne. Wɔadane ntɛm afiri ɔkwan a mehyɛɛ wɔn no so; wɔayɛ ohoni a wɔaguo afa.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Mahunu ɔman yi, na hwɛ, wɔyɛ ɔman a wɔn kɔn asene;
gyaa me ma mensɛe wɔn, na mempepa wɔn din mfiri asase so, na mede wo bɛyɛ ɔman a ɛyɛ den na ɛso sene wɔn.
Ɛnna medanee me ho mefirii bepɔ no so mesianeeɛ, na bepɔ no redɛre ogya, na apam apono mmienu no kurakura me nsam;
na mehunui, na hwɛ, na moayɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn bɔne ayɛ nantwie ba a wɔaguo afa: Moamane ntɛm afiri ɔkwan a AWURADE hyɛɛ mo no so.
Ɛnna mefaa apono mmienu no meto firii me nsam guiɛ, na mebobɔɔ no wɔ mo anim.
Na mehwee AWURADE anim ase sɛ kane no, adaduanan awia ne anadwo, mannidi na mannom, mo bɔne a moyɛeɛ nyinaa, sɛ moyɛɛ deɛ ɛnyɛ wɔ AWURADE ani so de hyɛɛ no abufuo no nti.
Na mesuroo abufuhyeɛ a AWURADE anya no mo ho na ɔde rebɛsɛe mo no. Na AWURADE tiee me saa berɛ no nso.
Na AWURADE faa Aaron ho abufuo kɛse sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe no, na mepaa kyɛw memaa Aaron nso saa berɛ no.
Na mefaa mo bɔne a moyɛeɛ a ɛne nantwie ba no, na mede ogya mehyee, na mesi meyam no muhumuhu kɔsii sɛ ɛfee sɛ mfuturo, na metoo ne mfuturo no guu asuo a ɛfiri bepɔ no so sene no mu.
Na Tabera ne Masa ne Kibrot-hataawa nso mohyɛɛ AWURADE abufuo.
Na AWURADE somaa mo firi Kades-barnea kaa sɛ: Momforo nkɔfa asase a mede mama mo no, motee AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anomu asɛm so atua, na moannye no anni, na moantie ne nne.
AWURADE anim atuatefoɔ ne mo firi da a mehunuu mo.
Na mehwee ase AWURADE anim adaduanan, awia ne anadwo. Mehwee ase, ɛfiri sɛ na AWURADE aka sɛ ɔrebɛsɛe mo.
Ɛno nti mepaa AWURADE kyɛw sɛ: AWURADE Nyankopɔn, nsɛe wo man ne w’agyapadeɛ a wode wo kɛseyɛ agye wɔn na wode nsa a ɛyɛ den ayi wɔn afiri Misraim no.
Kae wo nkoa Abraham, Isak ne Yakob; nnane w’ani nhwɛ ɔman yi asoɔden ne wɔn amumuyɛ ne wɔn bɔne,
na asase a woyii yɛn firii soɔ no sofoɔ anka sɛ: AWURADE antumi amfa wɔn ankɔ asase a ɔkaa wɔn ɛho asɛm no so, na tane a ɔtane wɔn nti na ɔde wɔn firi kɔɔ sɛ ɔrekɔkunkum wɔn ɛserɛ soɔ.
Na wɔyɛ wo man ne w’agyapadeɛ a wode wo tumi kɛseɛ ne wo nsa a woatene ayi wɔn.
Saa berɛ no na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Sene aboɔpono mmienu sɛ kane deɛ no na fa foro bra me nkyɛn bepɔ no so, na yɛ dua adaka;
na mɛtwerɛ nsɛm a ɛwɔ kane apono a wobobɔeɛ no soɔ no mahyɛ apono no so, na fa sie adaka no mu.
Na meyɛɛ okuo adaka, na mesenee aboɔpono mmienu sɛ kane deɛ no, na meforoo bepɔ no a apono mmienu no kura me nsam.
Na AWURADE twerɛɛ apono no so sɛ kane ntwerɛeɛ no, nsɛm du no a ɔfiri ogya no mu ka kyerɛɛ mo wɔ bepɔ no so dwabɔ da no, na ɔde maa me.
Na medanee me ho siane firii bepɔ no so, mede apono no mebɛsiee adaka a meyɛeɛ no mu, na ɛwɔ hɔ sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ me no.
(Na Israelfoɔ tu firii Beerot-bene-yaakan kɔɔ Mosera. Ɛhɔ na Aaron wuiɛ na wɔsiee no wɔ hɔ, na ne ba Eleasa sii n’ananmu dii sɔfoɔ.
Ɛfiri hɔ na wɔtu kɔɔ Gudgod, na wɔfirii Gudgod kɔɔ Yotbat, asase a nsutene wɔ soɔ.
Saa berɛ no na AWURADE yii Lewifoɔ abusuakuo sɛ wɔnsoa AWURADE apam adaka no, na wɔnnyina n’anim nsom no, na wɔmfa ne din nhyira, a wɔayɛ de abɛduru nnɛ da yi.
Enti na Lewi annya kyɛfa ne agyapadeɛ ne nuanom mu. AWURADE ne n’agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ no no.)
Na me deɛ, megyinaa bepɔ no so sɛ kane no, adaduanan awia ne anadwo, na AWURADE tiee me saa berɛ no nso, na wampɛ sɛ ɔsɛe woɔ.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Sɔre kɔdi ɔman no anim ma wɔntu nkɔfa asase a mekaa wɔn nananom ntam sɛ mede bɛma wɔn no.

Na afei, Israel, ɛdeɛn na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn repɛ no wo nkyɛn? Ɛne sɛ wobɛsuro AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na wonante n’akwan nyinaa soɔ, na woadɔ no, na wode w’akoma nyinaa ne wo kra nyinaa asom AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn,
na woadi ne mmara nsɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi soɔ, na asi wo yie.
Hwɛ, ɔsoro ne ɔsoro mu soro yɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn dea, asase ne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa.
Nanso wo nananom nko na AWURADE bata wɔn ho sɛ ɔbɛdɔ wɔn, na wayi wɔn asefoɔ a wɔdi wɔn akyire a ɛne mo, afiri aman nyinaa mu, sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ nnɛ yi.
Enti montwitwa mo akoma twetia, na monnsene mo kɔn bio.
Na AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn yɛ anyame mu Nyankopɔn, ne Awurade mu Awurade, Onyankopɔn kɛseɛ no, Otumfoɔ a ne ho yɛ hu a ɔnhwɛ nnipa anim na ɔnnye adanmudeɛ;
ɔbu atɛn ma awisiaa ne okunafoɔ, na ɔdɔ ɔhɔhoɔ ma no aduane ne nkataho.
Enti monnɔ ahɔhoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ moyɛɛ ahɔhoɔ Misraim asase so.
AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn na suro no, ɔno na som no, na ne ho na bata, na ne din ho ntam na ka.
Ɔno ne w’ayeyie, na ɔne wo Nyankopɔn a wayɛ nnoɔma akɛseɛ a ɛyɛ hu a w’ani ahunu yi ama woɔ.
Akra aduɔson na wo nananom de siane kɔɔ Misraim, afei AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ wo dodoɔ sɛ ɔsoro nsoromma.
Enti dɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na hwɛ n’ahwɛdeɛ, n’ahyɛdeɛ ne n’atemmudeɛ ne ne mmara nsɛm nna nyinaa.
Na monhunu nnɛ, (na ɛnyɛ me ne mo mma a wɔnnim na wɔnhunuiɛ no) monhunu AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn ntea, ne kɛseyɛ, ne nsa a ɛyɛ den ne ne basa a watene mu
ne ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne ne nneyɛɛ a ɔyɛɛ no Misraim a ɔde yɛɛ Misraimhene Farao ne n’asase nyinaa,
ne deɛ ɔyɛɛ Misraim dɔm ne n’apɔnkɔ ne ne nteaseɛnam a wɔde reti mo a ɔmaa Mmɛwa Po mu nsuo bu faa wɔn soɔ, na AWURADE sɛee wɔn, de abɛduru nnɛ da yi,
ne deɛ ɔyɛɛ mo ɛserɛ so bɛsii sɛ moduruu ha yi,
ne deɛ ɔyɛɛ Ruben ba Eliab mma Datan ne Abiram a asase buee n’anomu menee wɔn ne wɔn afie ne wɔn ntomadan ne wɔn a wɔdii wɔn akyire nyinaa firii Israel nyinaa mfimfini no;
na mo ani ahunu AWURADE nneyɛɛ akɛseɛ a ɔyɛeɛ no nyinaa.
Enti monni mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi nyinaa so, na mo ho ayɛ den, na moakɔ akɔfa asase a moretwam akɔ so akɔfa no,
na mo nna aware asase a AWURADE kaa mo nananom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn ne wɔn asefoɔ no so, asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene wɔ soɔ.
Na asase a worekɔ akɔfa no nte sɛ Misraim asase a mofiri so baeɛ a woguu w’aba na wode wo nan guguu so nsuo sɛ ɛfan turo mu no;
na asase a moretwam akɔ so akɔfa no yɛ mmepɔ ne mmonhwa asase a ɛnom ɔsoro nsuo,
asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn hwɛ so daa, a n’ani wɔ so firi afe mfitiaseɛ kɔsi afe awieeɛ.
Na sɛ motie me mmara nsɛm a mede merema mo nnɛ yi, sɛ mode mo akoma nyinaa bɛdɔ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn na moasom no a,
ɛnneɛ mɛma mo asase so osuo atɔ ne berɛ mu, asusɔ ne bereamporɔ, na woaboaboa w’aburoo ne wo nsa ne wo ngo ano,
na mɛma wo serɛ so aba wira ama w’afieboa, na woadidi amee.
Monhwɛ mo ho yie na wɔannaadaa mo akoma, na moammane ankɔsom anyame foforɔ ansɔre wɔn,
na AWURADE abufuo annɛre antia mo, na wanto ɔsoro mu sɛ osuo nntɔ na asase mmma ne nnɔbaeɛ, na moansɛe ntɛm so amfiri asase pa a AWURADE de rema mo no so.
Enti momfa me nsɛm yi nsie mo akoma ne mo kra mu, na fa yɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ kyekyere wo nsa, na ɛnyɛ w’aniwa ntam nkaeɛ abotire;
na momfa nkyerɛkyerɛ mo mma, na kasa ho w’afitena mu ne wo kwan so nanteɛ mu ne wo nna mu ne wo sɔreɛ mu;
na twerɛ gu wo fie aponnwa ho ne w’aponkɛseɛ so;
na wo nna ne wo mma nna adɔɔso asase a AWURADE kaa wo nananom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn no so, sɛdeɛ ɔsoro a ɛkata asase soɔ yi nna teɛ.
Na sɛ mobɛdi mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ mo yi so ayɛ, na moadɔ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anante n’akwan nyinaa so na moabata ne ho a,
ɛnneɛ AWURADE bɛtutu amanaman yi nyinaa afiri mo anim, na moafa amanaman akɛseɛ a wɔyɛ den sene mo.
Baabiara a mo nan bɛtia no bɛyɛ mo deɛ, ɛfiri ɛserɛ so ne Lebanon, ɛfiri Asubɔntene Eufrate ho, kɔsi akyiri po no ano bɛyɛ mo asase.
Obiara rentumi nnyina mo anim; AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de mo ho hu ne mo ho suro bɛgu asase a mobɛfa soɔ nyinaa so, sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ mo no.
Hwɛ, mede nhyira ne nnome meregu mo anim nnɛ:
Sɛ motie AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi a, mobɛnya nhyira,
na sɛ moantie AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm na momane firi ɔkwan a merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi so kɔdi anyame foforɔ a monni wɔn akyiri a, mobɛnya nnome.
Na sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wo duru asase a worekɔ akɔfa no so a, ka nhyira no Gerisim bepɔ so ne nnome no nso Ebal bepɔ so.
Ɛnni Yordan agya, owiatɔeɛ kwan no akyi, Kanaanfoɔ a wɔte Araba asase so, Gilgal ntentensoɔ, More pɔ ho?
Na morebɛtwa Yordan akɔ akɔfa asase a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de rema mo no, na mobɛfa atena so.
Enti monhwɛ yie na monyɛ ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a mede meresi mo anim nnɛ yi nyinaa.
Yeinom ne ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ a monhwɛ nyɛ no asase a AWURADE wo nananom Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ fa no soɔ, nna a mode te asase soɔ nyinaa.
Sɛeɛ na monsɛe ɔsombea a amanaman a morekɔtu wɔn no som wɔn anyame, mmepɔ atentene so ne nkokoɔ so ne dua mono biara ase no nyinaa;
na monnwiri wɔn afɔrebukyia, na mommubu wɔn aboɔ adum, na momfa ogya nhye wɔn abosompɔ, na mommobɔ wɔn anyame ahoni, na monsɛe wɔn din mfiri hɔ.
Monnyɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn saa,
na mmom faako a ɔbɛyi mo mmusuakuo nyinaa mu sɛ ɔde ne din bɛtoɔ na watena no na monhwɛ, na ɛhɔ na monkorɔ;
na ɛhɔ na momfa mo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne mo kum afɔdeɛ ne mo ntotosoɔ du du ne mo nsam mmasoɔ adeɛ ne mo bɔhyɛ adeɛ ne mo ayamyi afɔdeɛ ne mo anantwie ne mo nnwan mmakan nkorɔ;
na ɛhɔ na monnidi AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anim, na mo ne mo afie ani nnye ade a mode mo nsa ka a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de ahyira woɔ no mu nyinaa.
Monnyɛ sɛdeɛ yɛreyɛ no ɛha nnɛ yi biara a obiara yɛ deɛ ɛtene n’ani soɔ nyinaa no;
na ɛde bɛsi sɛsɛɛ yi monnya nnuruu home ne agyapadeɛ a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no mu.
Na sɛ monya twa Yordan kɔtena asase a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de rema mo sɛ monni soɔ no so, na ɔma mo home firi mo atamfoɔ a wɔatwa mo ho ahyia no nyinaa ho na motena ase dwoodwoo a,

ɛnneɛ faako a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn bɛyi ama ne din atena no, ɛhɔ na momfa deɛ merehyɛ mo no nyinaa nkorɔ: Mo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne mo kum afɔdeɛ ne mo ntotosoɔ du du ne mo nsam mmasoɔ adeɛ ne mo bɔhyɛ adeɛ a moyie a mode hyɛ AWURADE bɔ no nyinaa.
Na momma mo ani nnye AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anim, mo ne mo mmammarima ne mo mmammaa ne mo nkoa ne mo mfenaa ne Lewini a ɔwɔ mo kuro apono mu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno deɛ, ɔnni mo mu kyɛfa anaa agyapadeɛ.
Hwɛ wo ho yie na woammɔ wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ baabiara a wohunu,
gye faako a AWURADE bɛyi wɔ wo mmusuakuo baako mu no, ɛhɔ na bɔ wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ, na yɛ deɛ merehyɛ woɔ nyinaa.
Nanso ɛnam biara a wo kra kɔn dɔ no, kum di, sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyira wo wɔ wo nkuro nyinaa mu; obi a ne ho nteɛ ne deɛ ne ho teɛ nni bi, sɛ ɔwansane ne ɔforoteɛ;
mogya no nko na monnnie, monhwie ngu fam sɛ nsuo.
Deɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ wodie wɔ wo nkuro mu ne: W’aburoo ne wo nsa ne wo ngo ntotosoɔ du du ne w’anantwie ne wo nnwan mmakan ne wo bɔhyɛ adeɛ biara a woahyɛ ho bɔ ne w’ayamyi afɔdeɛ ne wo nsam mmasoɔ adeɛ;

gye sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim, faako a ɔbɛyie no na die, wo ne wo babarima ne wo babaa ne w’akoa ne w’afenaa ne Lewini a ɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu, na ma w’ani nnye AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim, deɛ wode wo nsa ka nyinaa ho.
Hwɛ yie na wo werɛ amfiri Lewini, nna a wode te w’asase soɔ nyinaa.
Na sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn trɛ wo hyeɛ mu sɛdeɛ waka akyerɛ woɔ no, na wose mɛdi nam, ɛfiri sɛ wo kra kɔn dɔ sɛ ɔbɛdi nam a, di nam sɛdeɛ wo kra kɔn dɔ.
Sɛ faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛyi de ne din ato hɔ no ne wo ntam ware a, ɛnneɛ kum w’anantwie ne wo nnwan a AWURADE de ama woɔ no bi, sɛdeɛ mehyɛɛ woɔ no, na di no wo kuro mu, sɛdeɛ wo kra kɔn dɔ;
sɛdeɛ wɔdi ɔwansane ne ɔforoteɛ no, saa ara nso na die; obi a ne ho nteɛ ne deɛ ne ho teɛ nyinaa nni.
Hwɛ yie mmom na hwɛ na woanni mogya, ɛfiri sɛ mogya ne ɔkra, na nni ɔkra nka nam no ho;
nni, hwie gu fam sɛ nsuo;
nni, na ɛnsi wo ne wo mma a wɔdi w’akyire yie, sɛ woreyɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani soɔ.
Fa akronkronneɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ wode ma, ne wo bɔhyɛ adeɛ na ma so kɔ faako a AWURADE bɛkyerɛ hɔ.
Na fa nam ne mogya no bɔ wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrebukyia so, na wɔnhwie w’afɔdeɛ no mogya ngu n’afɔrebukyia no so, na nam no deɛ, di.
Hwɛ na tie nsɛm a merehyɛ woɔ nyinaa na ɛnsi wo ne wo mma a wɔdi w’akyire yie daa, sɛ woreyɛ deɛ ɛyɛ na ɛtene AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ani so.
Sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn twitwa amanaman a worekɔ hɔ akɔtu wɔn no firi w’anim, na wotu wɔn tena wɔn asase so a,
hwɛ wo ho yie na sɛeɛ a wɔasɛe wɔn afiri w’anim no akyiri no wɔn akyiridie anyɛ wo fidie, na woammisa wɔn anyame akyiri kwan sɛ: Amanaman yi som wɔn anyame sɛn? Na me nso menyɛ saa.
Nyɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn saa, na n’akyiwadeɛ a ɔtane nyinaa na wɔayɛ ama wɔn anyame, na wɔn mmammarima ne wɔn mmammaa mpo, wɔde ogya hye wɔn ma wɔn anyame.
Asɛm a merehyɛ mo nyinaa, monhwɛ nni so; mfa bi nka ho na nyi bi nso mfiri mu.
Sɛ odiyifoɔ anaa ɔdaeɛsofoɔ bi sɔre wo mu, na ɔma wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ anaa anwanwadeɛ bi,
na nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ anaa anwanwadeɛ a ɔka kyerɛɛ woɔ no ba mu na ɔka sɛ: Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔdi anyame foforɔ a wonni wɔn akyi nkɔsom wɔn a,
ntie odiyifoɔ anaa ɔdaeɛsofoɔ no nsɛm no. Ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn resɔ mo ahwɛ na wahunu sɛ mode mo akoma nyinaa ne mo kra nyinaa bɛdɔ no anaa.
AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn akyi na monnie, na ɔno na monsuro no, na ne mmara nsɛm so na monnie, na ne nne na montie, na monsom no, na mommata ne ho.

Na odiyifoɔ anaa ɔdaeɛsofoɔ no, monku no, ɛfiri sɛ wakasa sɛ mommane mfiri AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn a ɔyii mo firii Misraim asase soɔ na ɔgyee mo firii nkoafie no ho de retwetwe wo afiri ɔkwan a wahyɛ wo sɛ nante mu no so; na tu bɔne no firi wo mu.

Sɛ wo nuabarima, wo na ba anaa wo babarima anaa wo babaa anaa wo yere a ɔda wo kokom anaa w’adamfo a ɔte sɛ wo ara wo kra redaadaa wo kokoam sɛ: Ma yɛnkɔ nkɔsom anyame foforɔ a wo ne wo nananom nnim wɔn,
amanaman a wɔatwa wo ho ahyia a wɔbɛn woɔ anaasɛ wɔmmɛn woɔ firi asase ano kɔsi asase ano nohoa anyame bi, a,
mpene no na ntie no, na mma w’ani nnhu no mmɔbɔ, nanso mma no nnyɛ wo mmɔbɔ na mfa no nhunta.
Na kum na ku no, wo nsa na ɛnni kan ntɔ ne so sɛ woreku no, na ɛno akyiri no ɔman no nyinaa nsa;
na si no aboɔ ma no nwu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔrehwehwɛ atwetwe wo afiri AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔyii wo Misraim asase soɔ firii nkoafie no ho;
na Israel nyinaa ntie na wɔnsuro, na wɔankɔ so anni wo mu asɛmmɔne a ɛte seyie.
Sɛ wote wo nkuro a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woatena mu no bi nka sɛ:
Mmarima mmabusufoɔ bi asɔre wo mu adaadaa wɔn nkurɔfoɔ sɛ: Momma yɛnkɔ nkɔsom anyame foforɔ a monnim wɔn a,
ɛnneɛ hwehwɛ mu na bisabisa mu yie; na hwɛ sɛ asɛm no wom ampa sɛ wɔayɛ saa akyiwadeɛ yi wɔ wo mu a,
kum na fa nkrantɛ kum kuro no mufoɔ. Fa nkrantɛ sɛe ɛno ne deɛ ɛwom nyinaa ne emu afieboa pasapasa;
na boaboa emu asadeɛ nyinaa ano gu abɔntene so, na fa ogya hye kuro no ne emu asadeɛ no nyinaa sɛ afɔdeɛ mu ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na ɛnyɛ daa amamfo a wɔnnkyekyere bio.
Na mma abusudeɛ no bi nnka wo nsam; na AWURADE nnane mfiri n’abufuhyeɛ no ho, na ɔnhu wo mmɔbɔ, na ne yam nhyehye no mma wo, na ɔmma wonnɔɔso sɛdeɛ ɔkaa wo nananom ntam no.
Sɛ wobɛtie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nne adi ne mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nyinaa so ayɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ani so a.
AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn mma ne mo, mommmotabota mo ho na monnyɛ ahyɛnsodeɛ wɔ mo moma so mmma owufoɔ biara;
na ɔman kronkron ne wo ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na wo na AWURADE ayi wo sɛ yɛ no ahodeɛ man, asase so aman nyinaa mu.
Nni akyiwadeɛ biara.
Yeinom ne mmoa a monnie: Nantwie, odwanten ne abirekyie;
ɔforoteɛ, adowa, ɔwansane, eyuo, ɔtwe, ɛkoɔ ne abedeɛ.
Na atɔteboa biara a ɔwɔ tɔte a emu apaeɛ, na ne tɔte mu apae nta mmienu, na ɔpu wesa, mmoa mu no, ɔno na monnie.
Nanso yeinom deɛ, monnni, wɔn a wɔpu wesa ne wɔn a wɔn tɔte mu apae koraa no mu: Yoma, adanko ne atwaboa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔpu wesa deɛ, nanso wɔn tɔte mu mpae, wɔn ho nte mma mo;
ne prako nso, ɛfiri sɛ ne tɔte mu apae deɛ, nanso ɔmpu nwesa, ne ho nte mma mo. Monnni wɔn nam, na monnka wɔn afunu.
Yei ne deɛ monnie, deɛ ɛwɔ nsuom nyinaa mu, deɛ ɛwɔ tɛtɛ ne abon nyinaa, monni.
Na biribiara a ɛnni tɛtɛ ne abon no, monnni: Ɛho nte mma mo.
Anomaa biara a ne ho teɛ no, monni.
Na yeinom ne wɔn a monnnie: Ɔkɔdeɛ, ɔkorɔbia, asuo so kɔdeɛ,
ɔkompɛtɛ, asansa, ɔkom, n’ahodoɔ,
anene ahodoɔ nyinaa,
sohori, anadwoakorɔma ne ɛpo so asomfenakatakyi, akorɔma, n’ahodoɔ,
patubiaa, patukɛseɛ, bakanoma
nantwinoma, ɔpɛtɛ, ɛpo so anene,
sukɔnkɔn, sukɔnkɔn ahodoɔ, asɔkwaa ne apan.
Na ntuboa a wɔwea nyinaa ho nte mma mo; monnni.
Ntuboa a wɔn ho teɛ nyinaa, monni.
Monnni aboa funu; fa ma ɔhɔhoɔ a ɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu ma no nni anaasɛ tɔn ma ɔnanani, ɛfiri sɛ woyɛ ɔman kronkron ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn. Nnoa odwan ba wɔ ne na nufosuo mu.
W’adeɛ a woduaeɛ nnɔbaeɛ a w’afuo ma daa afirinhyia no, yi so ntotosoɔ du du.
Na di no wɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim wɔ faako a ɔbɛyi sɛ ne din ntena no, w’aburoo, wo nsa ne wo ngo so ntotosoɔ du du, w’anantwie ne wo nnwan mmakan, na woasua AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn suro nna nyinaa.
Na sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn hyira wo na sɛ ɔkwan no ware a wontumi nsoa, ɛfiri sɛ faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ayi sɛ ɔde ne din bɛto hɔ no ne wo ntam ware a,
ɛnneɛ dane no sika, na kyekyere sika no kura, na sim kɔ faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ayie no.
Na fa sika no tɔ adeɛ biara a wo kra kɔn dɔ, nantwie ne odwan ne bobesa ne nsa biara a ɛyɛ den ne adeɛ biara a wo kra pɛ, na di no hɔ, AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim, na ma wo ne wo fie ani nnye.
Na Lewini a ɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu no, mma wo werɛ mmfiri no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnni kyɛfa ne agyapadeɛ biara sɛdeɛ wo deɛ wowɔ.
Mfeɛ mmiɛnsa awieeɛ no, yi w’afe no mu nnɔbaeɛ so ntotosoɔ du du gugu wo kuro apono mu,

na Lewini, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnni kyɛfa ne agyapadeɛ biara sɛdeɛ wo deɛ wowɔ no, ne ɔhɔhoɔ ne awisiaa ne okunafoɔ a wɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu mmra mmɛdi mmee, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyira wo, wo nsa ano adwuma a woyɛ nyinaa mu.
Mfirinhyia nson biara awieeɛ no, gya biribi mu kyɛ.
Na sɛdeɛ wɔnnyaa mu nkyɛ nie: Ɔdefɛmni biara a ɔde biribi afɛm ne yɔnko mfa nkyɛ no; ɔnnhyɛ ne yɔnko ne ne nua sɛ ɔntua, ɛfiri sɛ wɔapae no adekyɛ afe ama AWURADE.
Ɔnanani deɛ, hyɛ no ma no ntua, nanso wo biribi a ɛwɔ wo nua nkyɛn deɛ, fa kyɛ.
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ ohiani wɔ wo mu, ɛfiri sɛ hyira na AWURADE bɛhyira wo, asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ agyapadeɛ a kɔfa no so.
Tie nko na tie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nne sɛ wobɛhwɛ adi mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nyinaa so.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛhyira wo sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ woɔ no, na wode afɛm amanaman pii, na wo deɛ, worenkɔfɛm, na wobɛdi amanaman pii so, na wo deɛ, wɔrenni wo so.
Sɛ wo nuanom mu biara dane ohiani wɔ kuro biara apono mu, w’asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so a, mpirim w’akoma, na mmua wo nsa so ntia wo nua hiani.
Na bue wo nsam ma no, na fɛm no deɛ ɛbɛso ne hia a ɛhia no no.
Hwɛ yie na w’akomam amma ahuhusɛm bi sɛ: Afe a ɛtɔ so nson, gyae-mukyɛ afe no abɛn, na woannya wo nua hiani no ho adwemmɔne sɛ woremma no hwee, na wanteam amfrɛ AWURADE antia wo, na annane wo bɔne.
Yi wo yam ma no, na mma no nnyɛ w’akoma ahi sɛ wobɛma no; na saa adeɛ yi nti AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛhyira wo, wo nnwuma nyinaa ne deɛ wode wo nsa bɛka nyinaa mu.
Na ohiani rempa w’asase so, enti na merehyɛ wo sɛ, bue wo nsam ma wo nua, wo mmɔborɔni ne wo hiani a ɔwɔ w’asase soɔ.
Sɛ wɔtɔn wo nua Hebrini, ɔbarima anaa ɔbaa ma wo, na ɔsom wo mfirinhyia nsia a, afe a ɛtɔ so nson no gya no kwan ma no mfiri wo nkyɛn mfa ne ho nkɔdi.
Na sɛ woregya no kwan ama no afa ne ho afiri wo nkyɛn akɔdi a, mma no nnkɔ nsapan:
Fa wo nnwan ne w’ayuporebea ne wo nsakyi-amena no bi kyɛ no; adeɛ a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de ahyira woɔ no bi na fa ma no.
Na kae sɛ woyɛɛ akoa Misraim asase so, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn gyee wo; enti na nnɛ merehyɛ wo mmara yi.
Na sɛ ɛba sɛ ɔka kyerɛ wo sɛ: Meremfiri wo nkyɛn, na medɔ wo ne wo fie, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdi yie wɔ wo nkyɛn a,
ɛnneɛ fa fitiiɛ fiti n’aso mu aponnwa ho na ɔnyɛ w’akoa daa; na w’afenaa nso yɛ no saa ara.
Mma no nnyɛ wo den sɛ wobɛgya no kwan na wafa ne ho afiri wo nkyɛn akɔdie, na wasom wo mfirinhyia nsia ayɛ ɔpaani akatua mmienu ho adeɛ; na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyira wo deɛ woyɛ nyinaa mu.
W’anantwie ne wo nnwan mmakan anini a wɔbɛwoɔ no, yɛ wɔn kronkron ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn. Mfa wo nantwie abakan nyɛ adwuma, na ntwitwa wo nnwan abakan ho.
AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim na di no daa afirinhyia, faako a AWURADE bɛyie no, wo ne wo fie.
Na sɛ ɛdɛm bi wɔ ne ho, ɔtɔ apakye anaasɛ n’ani afira, anaasɛ ɛdɛmmɔne biara wɔ ne ho a, mfa no mmɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn afɔdeɛ;
wo kuro apono mu na die, deɛ ne ho nteɛ ne deɛ ne ho teɛ nyinaa, sɛdeɛ wɔdi ɔwansane ne ɔforoteɛ no;
ne mogya nko na nnie, hwie gu fam sɛ nsuo.
Hwɛ bosome Abib na di Twam ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ bosome Abib mu na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn yii wo firii Misraim anadwo.
Enti kum Twam afɔdeɛ no ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, nnwan ne anantwie, faako a AWURADE ayi sɛ ne din ntena no.
Nni mmɔreka paanoo nka ho; nnanson na di apiti, amanehunu paanoo, ɛfiri sɛ ɛherɛ so na wofirii Misraim asase soɔ, na woakae wo Misraim asase so fire da no, wo nkwa nna nyinaa.
Na mma wɔnnhunu mmɔreka wɔ wo nkyɛn, w’asase nyinaa so nnanson; nso mma nam a wɔku no da a ɛdi kan anwummerɛ no bi nnka nnkɔsi anɔpa.
Nkum Twam no wɔ wo nkuro a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no biara mu,
gye faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛyi sɛ ne din ntena no, ɛhɔ na kum Twam no anwummerɛ a owia rekɔtɔ no, wo Misraim fire berɛ no mu;
na ma no mmen na di no faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛkyerɛ hɔ, na adeɛ kye a, woasane akɔ wo ntomadan mu.
Nnansia na di apiti, na da a ɛtɔ so nson no nyɛ afahyɛ nhyiam mma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn; nyɛ adwuma biara.
Adapɛn nson na kan fa; da a wɔrefiri aseɛ de kantankrankyi ahyɛ ayuo mu no na firi kan adapɛn nson;
na di adapɛn dapɔnna ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɔ wo nsam ayamyi afɔdeɛ sɛdeɛ wahyira woɔ no.

Na ma w’ani nnye AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim, wo ne wo babarima ne wo babaa ne w’akoa ne w’afenaa ne Lewini a ɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu ne ɔhɔhoɔ ne awisiaa ne okunafoɔ a wɔwɔ mo mu, faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛyi sɛ ne din ntena no;
na kae sɛ woyɛɛ akoa Misraim, na hwɛ na yɛ ahyɛdeɛ yi.
Di asese nnapɔnna nnanson, berɛ a woaboaboa w’ayuporebea ne wo nsa-kyi-amena mu adeɛ ano no;
na ma w’ani nnye wo nnapɔnna no mu, wo ne wo babarima, wo babaa, w’akoa, w’afenaa, Lewini, ɔhɔhoɔ, awisiaa ne okunafoɔ a wɔwɔ wo kuro apono mu.
Nnanson na di dapɔnna no ma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn faako a wayie hɔ: Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛhyira wo, wo nnɔbaeɛ mu ne wo nsa ano adwuma nyinaa mu; enti ma w’ani nnye ara.

Afirinhyia baako mu mprɛnsa na wo mmarima nyinaa mmɛyi wɔn ho adi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim faako a ɔbɛkyerɛ hɔ. Apiti nnapɔnna, adapɛn dapɔnna ne asese nnapɔnna mu; na wɔmmfa nsapan mmmɛyi wɔn ho adi AWURADE anim.
Obiara mma deɛ ne nsa bɛso soɔ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nhyira a ɔde ahyira woɔ no teɛ.
Sisi wo so atemmufoɔ ne mpanimfoɔ, wo nkuro a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛdeɛ wo mmusuakuo teɛ no nyinaa mu, na wɔmfa atɛntenenee mmu ɔman no.
Nnane atemmuo ani, nhwɛ nnipa anim na nnye adanmudeɛ; na adanmudeɛ fira anyansafoɔ ani, na ɛdane teneneefoɔ nsɛm ani butu.
Asɛntenenee nko ara akyi na die, na woanya nkwa, na woakɔfa asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no.
Ntɛ nnua biara mfa nyɛ abosompɔ wɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrebukyia a worebɛsie no ho;
na mfa ɔboɔ dum nsi hɔ mfa; na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn akyiwadeɛ ne no.
Mfa nantwie anaa odwan a ne ho wɔ dɛm anaa adebɔne biara mmɔ afɔdeɛ mma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ n’akyiwadeɛ.
Sɛ wɔhunu wo mu, wo nkuro a ɔde rema woɔ no biara mu ɔbarima anaa ɔbaa bi a ɔyɛ deɛ ɛnyɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ani soɔ bu apam so,
na ɔkɔ kɔsom anyame foforɔ bi te sɛ owia anaa ɔsrane anaa ɔsoro asafo a mabara no mu biara,
na wɔka kyerɛ wo na wote a, ɛnneɛ hwehwɛ mu yie; na sɛ wohunu sɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ, na asɛm no wom sɛ wɔayɛ saa akyiwadeɛ yi wɔ Israel a,
ɛnneɛ fa ɔbarima anaa ɔbaa a wadi saa asɛmmɔne yi firi adi wo kuro apono ho, na si no aboɔ ma ɔnwu.
Adansefoɔ baanu anaa baasa anomu asɛm so na wɔmfa nkum deɛ ɔsɛ wuo; wɔmmfa ɔdanseni baako anomu asɛm so nnku no.
Adansefoɔ no nsa na ɛngu ne so kane nku no, na ɛno akyiri no ɔman no nyinaa nsa; na yi bɔne no firi wo mu.
Sɛ asɛm bi a ɛho atemmuo yɛ wo den te sɛ awudie, manso, ɔpira ne ɔbɔ ne ɔbɔ ntam si, na ɛyɛ wo nkuro mu akasakasa nsɛm bi a, ɛnneɛ sɔre kɔ faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛkyerɛ,
na kɔ asɔfoɔ Lewifoɔ ne ɔtemmufoɔ a ɔwɔ so saa berɛ no nkyɛn kɔbisa, na wɔnkyerɛ wo atɛn a buo.
Na di asɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛ wo faako a AWURADE bɛkyerɛ no so, na hwɛ na yɛ sɛdeɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ woɔ nyinaa.
Mmara a wɔbɛkyerɛ woɔ ne atemmuo a wɔbɛka akyerɛ woɔ no so na die, mmane mfiri asɛm a wɔbɛkyerɛ woɔ no ho nkɔ nifa anaa benkum.
Na onipa a ɔbɛdi ahantansɛm na ɔrentie ɔsɔfoɔ a ɔgyina hɔ som AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anaa ɔtemmufoɔ no, saa onipa no nwu;
na yi bɔne no firi Israel, na ɔman no nyinaa nte na wɔnsuro, na wɔanni ahantansɛm bio.
Sɛ woduru asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so na wofa tena so, na woka sɛ: Mɛsi me so hene sɛ amanaman a wɔatwa me ho ahyia no nyinaa a,
fa deɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛyi no no si wo so hene; wo nuanom mu bi na fa no si wo so hene; mfa ɔnanani bi a ɔnyɛ wo nua nsi wo so hene.
Nanso ɔhene no mma n’apɔnkɔ nnnɔɔso, na ɔmmma ɔman no nnsane nnkɔ Misraim nkɔpɛ apɔnkɔ dodoɔ; na AWURADE aka akyerɛ mo sɛ monnsane mmfa ɔkwan yi so bio.
Nanso ɔmmma ne yerenom nnnɔɔso, na n’akoma ammane; saa ara na ɔmmma ne dwetɛ ne sika nnnɔɔso pii.
Na sɛ ɔte n’ahennie adwa so a, ɔnhwɛ mmara yi nwoma a ɛda asɔfoɔ ne Lewifoɔ anim no so ntwerɛ bi mfa;
na ɛntena ne nkyɛn, na ɔnkenkan mu, ne nkwa nna nyinaa, na wasua AWURADE ne Nyankopɔn suro, ne mmara yi mu nsɛm nyinaa ne ahyɛdeɛ yi so hwɛ ne ɛsodie,
na n’akoma amma ne ho so ansene ne nuanom, na wammane amfiri mmara nsɛm no ho ankɔ nifa anaa benkum, na ama ne nna aware n’ahennie mu, ɔno ne ne mma, Israel mu.
Wɔmmma Lewifoɔ asɔfoɔ, Lewi abusuakuo nyinaa nnnya kyɛfa ne agyapadeɛ biara Israel mu: AWURADE gya afɔdeɛ so adeɛ ne n’agyapadeɛ a wɔnnie;
na ɔrennya agyapadeɛ ne nuanom mu; AWURADE ne n’agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ no no.
Na yei nyɛ asɔfoɔ no kyɛfa a ɛfiri ɔman no nsam mfiri wɔn a wɔbɔ afɔdeɛ no nkyɛn, nantwie oo, odwan oo: Wɔmfa basa ne abɔgyeɛ ne efuro mma ɔsɔfoɔ no;
w’aburoo, wo nsa ne wo ngo adikan ne wo nnwan ho nwi a wotwa kane no, fa ma no,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ayi no afiri wo mmusuakuo nyinaa mu, sɛ ɔnnyina nsom AWURADE din mu, ɔno ne ne mma, nna nyinaa.
Na sɛ Lewini bi firi wo nkuro no biara mu, firi Israel mu baabiara a wakɔsoɛ, na ɔde ne pɛ nyinaa ba bɛtena faako a AWURADE bɛkyerɛ a,
ɛnneɛ ɔnsom AWURADE ne Nyankopɔn din mu sɛ ne nuanom Lewifoɔ a wɔgyina AWURADE anim hɔ nyinaa yɛ no.
Wɔnnya kyɛfa korɔ nni nka deɛ ɛfiri n’agyanom adeɛ a wɔatɔn mu no ho.
Sɛ wonya duru asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so a, nsua amanaman no nneyɛɛ a ɛyɛ akyiwadeɛ no yɛ.
Mma wɔnnhunu wo mu obi a ɔma ne babarima anaa ne babaa fa ogya mu, ɔkɔmfoɔ a ɔhyɛ abosonkɔm, ɔbayifoɔ, ɔdebisafoɔ, ntafowayifoɔ,
nkaberɛkyerefoɔ, samanfrɛfoɔ, adutofoɔ ne deɛ ɔbisa afunu,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE akyiwadeɛ ne wɔn a wɔyɛ yeinom nyinaa, na akyiwadeɛ yi nti na ɔretu wɔn afiri w’anim yi.
Wo ne AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ntena no amudie mu.
Na amanaman yi a worekɔtu wɔn yi tie abayifoɔ ne nkɔmhyɛfoɔ, na wo deɛ, AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn mmaa wo kwan sɛ yɛ no saa.
Odiyifoɔ a ɔfiri wo mu a ɔfiri wo nuanom mu te sɛ me na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma no so ama woɔ, ɔno na montie no.
Sɛdeɛ wobisaa AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn wɔ Horeb adwabɔ da no sɛ: Mma mennte AWURADE me Nyankopɔn nne bio, na mma mennhunu ogya kɛseɛ yi bio, na manwu!
Ɛno na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Deɛ wɔaka no wɔaka no yie:
Mɛma odiyifoɔ so mama wɔn wɔn nuanom mu sɛ wo; na mede me nsɛm bɛhyɛ n’anomu, na waka deɛ mɛhyɛ no nyinaa akyerɛ wɔn.
Na ɛbɛba sɛ obiara a ɔrentie me nsɛm a ɔbɛka no me din mu no, me na mɛbisa no ne hɔ.
Na odiyifoɔ a ɔbɛma ne ho so aka asɛm bi, me din mu, a menhyɛɛ no sɛ ɔnka, ne deɛ ɔbɛkasa anyame foforɔ din mu no, odiyifoɔ ko no bɛwu.
Ebia wobɛka no w’akoma mu sɛ: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛbɛhunu asɛm a AWURADE nkaeɛ no?
Sɛ odiyifoɔ bi kasa wɔ AWURADE din mu, na asɛm korɔ no amma mu anaa ɛnyɛ nokorɛ a, na asɛm no mfiri AWURADE; ahantan mu na odiyifoɔ no kasaeɛ, nsuro no.
Sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn twitwa amanaman a ɔde wɔn asase rema woɔ no, na wotu wɔn tena wɔn nkuro ne wɔn adan mu a,
yiyi w’asase a ɔde rema wo sɛ fa no so nkuro mmiɛnsa fa.
Siesie ɛhɔ kwan no fa, na kyɛ w’asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ di soɔ no mu mmiɛnsa, na onipakumfoɔ biara adwane akɔ hɔ.
Na onipakumfoɔ a ɔnnwane nkɔ hɔ na ɔnnya nkwa no ho asɛm nie: Deɛ ɔnnim na ɔde adeɛ bɔ ne yɔnko, nanso berɛ a atwam no ɔntane no,
sɛ ebia obi ne ne yɔnko kɔ kwaeɛ mu kɔto nnua, na ne nsa ma abonnua so de retwa dua, na dadeɛ no hɔn firi ne dua mu bɔ ne yɔnko ma no wu a, ɛnneɛ ɔnnwane nkɔ nkuro yi baako mu na ɔnnya nkwa;
na mogya ho weretɔfoɔ amfa abufuhyeɛ anti onipakumfoɔ no na ɔkwan no wareɛ nti, wankɔto no anku no; nso na ɛnsɛ sɛ onipa kumfoɔ no wuo, ɛfiri sɛ berɛ a atwam no na ɔntane ne yɔnko no.
Enti na merehyɛ wo sɛ yiyi nkuro mmiɛnsa fa.
Na sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn trɛ wo hyeɛ mu, sɛdeɛ ɔkaa wo nananom ntam no, na ɔde asase a ɔkaa sɛ ɔde bɛma wo nananom no nyinaa ma wo,
na sɛ wodi mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nyinaa so yɛ, na wodɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn na wonante n’akwan so nna nyinaa a, ɛnneɛ yiyi nkuro mmiɛnsa bio ka mmiɛnsa yi ho fa,
na wɔanhwie mogya a bɔne nni mu angu w’asase a ɔde rema wo sɛ di soɔ no so, na woanni mogya ho so.
Na sɛ obi tane ne yɔnko na ɔtɛ no sɔre to hyɛ ne so, na ɔde adeɛ bɔ no ma no wu, na ɔdwane kɔ nkuro yi baako mu a,
ɛnneɛ ne kurom mpanimfoɔ nsoma mma wɔnkɔfa no mfiri hɔ, na wɔmfa no nhyɛ mogya ho weretɔfoɔ no nsa, na ɔnwu.
Mma w’ani nhu no mmɔbɔ, na yi mogya a ɛdi bem ho afobuo firi Israel, na ɛnsi wo yie.
Ntwe wo yɔnko hyeɛ a tetefoɔ atwa no w’agyapadeɛ a woanya mu wɔ asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ fa no so.
Ɔdanseni baako nnsɔre nntia obi, amumuyɛ biara anaa bɔne biara ho, bɔne biara a wɔyɛ mu; adansefoɔ baanu anaa baasa anomu nsɛm so na asɛm biara nnyina.
Sɛ ɔdansekurumfoɔ bi sɔre tia obi di no mfomsoɔ ho adanseɛ a,
ɛnneɛ nnipa baanu a ɛham da wɔn ntam no mmɛgyina AWURADE anim, asɔfoɔ ne atemmufoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ nna no mu anim.
Na atemmufoɔ no mpeepee mu yie, na sɛ ɔdanseni no yɛ ɔdansekurumfoɔ na wadi ne nua ho adansekurumu a,
ɛnneɛ monyɛ no sɛdeɛ ɔsusuu sɛ anka ɔbɛyɛ ne nua no; na yi bɔne no firi wo mu,
na wɔn a aka no nte na wɔnsuro, na wɔankɔ so anni asɛmmɔne a ɛte seyie wɔ wo mu bio.
Na mma w’ani nnhunu mmɔbɔ: Ɔkra nsi ɔkra ananmu, ani nsi ani ananmu, ɛse nsi ɛse ananmu, nsa nsi nsa ananmu, ɛnan nsi ɛnan ananmu.
Sɛ woretu sa ne w’atamfo akɔko na wohunu apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam ne ɔman a wɔdɔɔso sene woɔ a, nsuro wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn a ɔde wo firi Misraim asase so baeɛ no ka wo ho.
Na sɛ mobɛn dɔm no a, ɔsɔfoɔ no mpinkyɛ mmɛkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no,
na ɔnka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Israel, tie, morebɛn dɔm nnɛ ne mo atamfoɔ akɔko, mommma mo akoma nntu, monnsuro na mo ho mmpopo, na mommma wɔn ho nnyɛ mo hu,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ne mo na ɛnam ne mo atamfoɔ rekɔko ama mo na wagye mo.
Na ahwɛfoɔ no nkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no sɛ: Onii ko a wasi dan foforɔ na ɔmmuee ano no, ma no nsane nkɔ ne fie, na wantɔ ɔko mu na obi ankɔbue ɛdan no ano.
Na onii ko a watɛ bobeturo na ɔnnya nyii ano no, ma no nsane nkɔ ne fie, na wantɔ ɔko mu, na obi anyi ano.
Na onii ko a wagye ɔbaa bi awadeɛ na ɔnnya nhyiaa no no, ma no nsane nkɔ ne fie, na wantɔ ɔko mu na obi ammfa no sɛ ɔyerɛ.
Na ahwɛfoɔ no nkɔ so nkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no sɛ: Onii ko a ɔsuro na n’akoma tuo no, ma no nsane nkɔ ne fie, na wamma ne nuanom akoma annane sɛ ne deɛ.
Na sɛ ahwɛfoɔ no wie ɔman no kasakyerɛ a, wɔmfa asafohene nsisi ɔman no ti.
Sɛ wobɛn kuro bi ne no rekɔko a, ka asomdwoeɛsɛm kyerɛ no.
Na sɛ ɔbua wo asomdwoeɛ so na ɔhini wo a, ɔman a wobɛhu wɔn hɔ no nyi toɔ mma wo nsom wo.
Na sɛ wɔne wo anni asomdwoeɛsɛm na wɔne wo ko a, ɛnneɛ tua kuro no;
na sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de hyɛ wo nsa a, fa nkrantɛ bobɔ emu mmarima nyinaa,
nanso mmaa ne mmɔfra ne afieboa ne deɛ ɛwɔ kuro no mu nyinaa, emu asadeɛ nyinaa deɛ, fom fa, na di w’atamfo asadeɛ a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de ama woɔ no.
Saa na yɛ nkuro a ɛne wo ntam kwan ware pii a ɛnyɛ amanaman yi nkuro bie no.
Na amanaman yi nkuro a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ di soɔ no mu deɛ, mma biribiara a ɛhome nnnya nkwa,
na sɛe wɔn pasapasa: Hetifoɔ, Amorifoɔ, Kanaanfoɔ, Perisifoɔ, Hewifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn hyɛɛ woɔ no.
Na wɔankyerɛ mo wɔn akyiwadeɛ a wɔyɛ ma wɔn anyame no nyinaa bi yɛ, na moanyɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn bɔne.
Sɛ wotua kuro bi nna pii ne no reko afa a, mfa akuma nsɛe hɔ nnua, na ɛso aba bi na die, na mmu ngu. Afuo mu dua yɛ onipa na woasɛe no?
Nanso nnua a wonim sɛ ɛnyɛ nnua a wɔdie no deɛ, sɛe no na twa fa yɛ kuro a ɛne wo redi ako no ntuaban kɔsi sɛ wobɛbrɛ no aseɛ.
Sɛ wohunu obi a wɔaku no da wiram asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ fa no so, na wonnim deɛ ɔkumm no a,
ɛnneɛ wo mpanimfoɔ ne w’atemmufoɔ mfiri adi nkɔsusu nkɔduru nkuro a ɛdeda deɛ wɔaku no no ho no so;
na kuro a ɛbɛn deɛ wɔaku no no ho no, saa kuro no mu mpanimfoɔ mfa nantwiburuwa a wɔmfaa no nyɛɛ adwuma na ɔntwee kɔnnua pɛn,
nsiane nkɔ subonhwa a nsuo sene wɔ mu a wɔnnɔeɛ na wɔnnuaa mu adeɛ da mu, na wɔmmu nantwiburuwa no kɔn mu wɔ subonhwa no mu.
Na Lewifoɔ mma asɔfoɔ no mmra ho, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ayi wɔn sɛ wɔnsom na wɔnhyira AWURADE din mu, na wɔn anomu asɛm so na wɔmfa nni akasakasa ne ɔborɔ ho asɛm biara;
na kuro a ɛbɛn deɛ wɔaku no no mu mpanimfoɔ no nyinaa nhohoro wɔn nsa ngu nantwiburuwa a wɔabu ne kɔn mu subonhwa no mu no so,
na wɔmma wɔn nne so nka sɛ: Ɛnyɛ yɛn nsa na ɛhwiee mogya yi guiɛ, na yɛn ani anhunu.
AWURADE fa kyɛ wo man Israel a woagye wɔn no, na mfa mogya a ɛdi bem ho afobuo ngu wo man Israel so; na fa mogya ho bɔne yi kyɛ wɔn.
Na wo deɛ, yi mogya a ɛdi bem ho afobuo firi wo mu, na yɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so.
Sɛ wotu sa ne w’atamfo rekɔko, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wɔn hyɛ wo nsa, na wofa wɔn mu bi nnommum,
na wohunu nnommum no mu baabereɛ bi, na wopɛ sɛ wofa no yɛ wo yere a,
ɛnneɛ fa no bra wo fie, na ɔnyi ne ti, na ɔmmubu ne mmɔwerɛ,
na ɔnyi ne dommum atadeɛ mfiri ne ho, na ɔntena wo fie nnyam n’agya ne ne na bosome mu, na ɛno akyiri no woakɔ ne ho aware no na wayɛ wo ɛyerɛ.
Na sɛ ɛba sɛ wompɛ no bio a, ma no mfa ne ho nkɔdi sɛdeɛ ɔpɛ, na tɔn deɛ, ntɔn no nnye sika, ɛne no nnni no sɛ afenaa, ɛfiri sɛ woahodwo no.
Sɛ ɔbarima bi wɔ yerenom baanu, na ɔdɔ ɔbaako, na ɔnnɔ ɔbaako, na wɔn baanu no no wowo mma ma no, na abakan no yɛ deɛ ɔnnɔ no no ba a,
ɛnneɛ da a ɔrekyɛ n’adeɛ mu ama ne mma no, ɔmmfa deɛ ɔdɔ no no ba nnyɛ abakan nnni deɛ ɔnnɔ no no ba a ɔyɛ abakan no anim.
Na ɔmmu deɛ ɔnnɔ no no ba no abakan mma no deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa mu abupɛn mmienu; na ɔne n’ahoɔden asefire, abakan dibea yɛ ne dea.
Sɛ obi wɔ ɔba ɔsoɔdenfoɔ ne otuatefoɔ a ɔntie n’agya ne ne na asɛm, na wɔtea no na ɔntie wɔn a,
ɛnneɛ n’agya ne ne na nkye no mfa no mfiri adi nkɔ ne kurom mpanimfoɔ nkyɛn wɔ kuro no pono ano,
na wɔnka nkyerɛ ne kuro no mu mpanimfoɔ no sɛ: Yɛn ba yi yɛ ɔsoɔdenfoɔ ne otuatefoɔ, ɔntie yɛn asɛm, ɔyɛ ohohwini ne nsabofoɔ.
Na ne kuro no mu mmarima nyinaa nsi no aboɔ mma no nwu; na yi bɔne no firi wo mu na Israel nyinaa nte na wɔnsuro.
Na sɛ obi yɛ bɔne a ɛsɛ kum na wɔku no de no sɛne dua bi so a,
ne funu no nntena dua no so anadwo, sie no da no ara; na deɛ wɔasɛne no no yɛ Nyankopɔn nnome, na woangu w’asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ di soɔ no ho fi.
Nhwɛ wo nua nantwie anaa ne dwanten sɛ wɔrefom kwan, na ntwe wo ho mfiri wɔn ho; fa no sane brɛ wo nua no.
Na sɛ wo nua no mmɛn wo anaa wonni no a, ɛnneɛ fa no bra wo fie na ɔntena wo nkyɛn nkɔsi sɛ wo nua no bɛhwehwɛ no na woadane no ama no.
Na saa nso na yɛ n’afunumu, ne ntoma, ne wo nua adeɛ biara a ayera a wobɛhunu no; ntwe wo ho mfiri ho.
Nhwɛ wo nua afunumu anaa ne nantwie sɛ wɔahwe ase kwan mu, na ntwe wo ho mfiri wɔn ho; boa no ma no mma wɔn so.
Ɔbaa nnhyɛ ɔbarima adeɛ, na ɔbarima nso mmfira ɔbaa ntoma, ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ yei nyinaa yɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn akyiwadeɛ.
Sɛ wokɔpue anomaa pirebuo ɔkwan mu, dua bi so anaa ɛfam, mma oo, nkosua oo, na ɛna no butu mma no anaa nkosua no so a, nkyere ɛna no nka mma no ho;
na ma ɛna no nkɔ, na fa mma no, na asi wo yie na wɔama wo nna aware.
Sɛ wosi dan foforɔ a, gye wo dan atifi ban, na obi amfiri hɔ anhwe ase, na woamfa mogya ho asodie amma wo dan no so.
Mfa ade ahodoɔ mmienu nnua wo bobeturom, na anyɛ saa a wobɛhwere w’aduadeɛ a woduaeɛ no ne bobe turo no mu nnɔbaeɛ no nyinaa.
Mfa nantwie ne afunumu mmɔ mu mfuntum.
Mfira ntoma a wɔde kuntu ne asaawa afra anwono.
Yɛ wo ntoma a wode kata wo soɔ ahinanan so nnwo.
Sɛ obi ware yerɛ na ɔkɔ ne ho, na ɔmpɛ no bio,
na ɔde animguasesɛm to ne so, na ɔbɔ no dimmɔne sɛ: Maware ɔbaa yi na mekɔɔ ne ho no, manto no ɔbaabunu a,
ɛnneɛ ababaawa no agya ne ne na mfa ababaawa no baabunuyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ mfiri mmra kuro no mu mpanimfoɔ nkyɛn wɔ kuro no pono ano,
na abaayewa no agya nka nkyerɛ mpanimfoɔ no sɛ: Mede me babaa mama ɔbarima yi aware, nso ɔmpɛ no bio.
Na hwɛ, ɔde animguasesɛm ato ne so sɛ: Manto wo babaa no ɔbaabunu; nso me ba baabunuyɛ adeɛ nie. Na wɔntrɛ ntoma no mu kuro no mu mpanimfoɔ no anim.
Na kurom hɔ mpanimfoɔ no mfa ɔbarima no ntwe n’aso,
na wɔnnye no dwetɛ nnwetɛbena ɔha mfa mma ababaa no agya, ɛfiri sɛ wabɔ Israel mu ɔbaabunu dimmɔne; na ɔnkɔso nware no, na ɔnnko no ne nna nyinaa mu.
Na sɛ asɛm yi yɛ nokwasɛm na wɔanhunu ababaawa no ɔbaabunu a,
ɛnneɛ wɔnyi ababaa no mmra n’agya fie aboboano, na ne kurom mmarima nsi no aboɔ mma no nwu, ɛfiri sɛ wayɛ nkwaseadeɛ Israel mu sɛ wabɔ adwaman n’agya fie; na yi bɔne no firi wo mu.
Sɛ wohunu ɔbarima bi sɛ ɔne ɔbaa a ɔyɛ obi yere da a, ɛnneɛ wɔn baanu no nwu, ɔbarima a ɔne ɔbaa no daeɛ no ne ɔbaa no; na yi bɔne no firi Israel.
Sɛ wɔde ababaawa a ɔyɛ ɔbaabunu ma ɔbarima bi aware, na ɔbarima bi hu no kuro mu na ɔne no da a,

ɛnneɛ momfa wɔn baanu no mfiri adi nkɔ kuro no pono n’akyi, na monsi wɔn aboɔ mma wɔnwuwu, ababaa no, ɛsiane sɛ ɔwɔ kuro mu na wanteam, ne ɔbarima no, sɛ wabrɛ ne yɔnko yere aseɛ nti; na yi bɔne no firi wo mu.
Na sɛ ɔbarima bi hunu ababaa ɔwarefoɔ wɔ wiram, na ɔbarima no kye no ne no da a, ɛnneɛ ɔbarima a ɔne no daeɛ no nko na ɔnwuo,
na ababaa no deɛ, nyɛ no hwee, bɔne a ɛsɛ wuo nni ababaa no so, ɛfiri sɛ sɛdeɛ onipa sɔre tia ne yɔnko ku no no, saa na asɛm yi teɛ.
Ɛfiri sɛ wiram na ɔhunuu no, na ababaa a wɔagye no aware no teaa mu, na na obi a ɔbɛgye no nni hɔ.
Sɛ ɔbarima bi hunu ababaawa a ɔyɛ ɔbaabunu a wɔmfaa no mmaa aware na ɔkye no ne no da na wɔhu wɔn a,
ɛnneɛ ɔbarima a ɔne no daeɛ no mma ababaa no agya dwetɛ nnwetɛbena aduonum, na ɔnyɛ ne yere sɛ ɔbrɛɛ no aseɛ nti; na ɔnnko no ne nna nyinaa.
Ɔbarima biara nnware n’agya yere, na ɔnnyi ɔbaa a ɔyɛ n’agya deɛ adagya so.
Deɛ wɔapɛkyɛ ne hwewa ne deɛ ne barima atwa no mmma AWURADE badwa mu.
Adwaman ba biara mmma AWURADE badwa mu; n’awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛtɔ so du mpo mmma AWURADE badwa mu.
Amonni anaa Moabni mmma AWURADE badwa mu; wɔn awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛtɔ so du mpo mmma AWURADE badwa mu da,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔamfa aduane ne nsuo ammɛhyia mo kwan mu, berɛ a mofiri Misraim reba no, ne sɛ wɔkɔbɔɔ Beor ba Bileam a ɔfiri Petor wɔ Mesopotamia paa sɛ ɔmmɛdome woɔ nti.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ampɛ sɛ ɔtie Bileam, na ɔdanee nnome no nhyira maa wo, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn dɔ wo.
Nhwehwɛ wɔn asomdwoeɛ ne wɔn papa da, wo nna nyinaa.
Nkyiri Edomni, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ wo nua. Nkyiri Misraimni, ɛfiri sɛ wokɔyɛɛ n’asase so hɔhoɔ.
Mma a wɔbɛwo ama wɔn no awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mmra AWURADE badwa mu.
Sɛ wofiri kɔkyere w’atamfo so nsraban a, hwɛ wo ho yie adebɔne nyinaa ho.
Sɛ ɔbarima bi wɔ wo mu a ne ho nteɛ wɔ ne ho a ɛsene anadwo no nti a, ɛnneɛ ɔmfiri nkɔ nsraban no akyi, ɔmmma nsraban no mu.
Na ɛrekɔ anwummerɛ no, ɔmfa nsuo nnware, na sɛ owia kɔtɔ a, ɔmmra nsraban no mu.
Na yɛ baabi, nsraban no akyi fa, na woafiri akɔgya wo nan wɔ hɔ.
Na fa sofi ka wo nnoɔma ho, na sɛ wokɔgya wo nan nsraban no akyiri hɔ awie no, fa sofi no tutu fam, na kata agyanan no so.
Ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nam wo nsraban mu sɛ ɔregye woɔ, na ɔde w’atamfo ama wɔ w’anim; enti ma wo nsraban mu nyɛ kronkron, na wanhunu wo mu aniwudeɛ biara, na wannane amfiri w’akyi.
Mfa akoa a wadwane afiri ne wura nkyɛn abɛdɔm woɔ nhyɛ ne wura nsa;
ɔntena wo nkyɛn wɔ mo mu, wo nkuro mu baako a ɔbɛfa a ɛyɛ ma no mu; nhyɛ ne so.
Israel mmammaa mu biara nnnane odwamamfoɔ, na Israel babarima biara nnnane odwamamfoɔ.
Mfa ɔbaa odwamamfoɔ apɛdeɛ anaa ɔkraman (ɔbarima odwamamfoɔ) apaadeɛ mma AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn fie wɔ wo bɔhyɛ biara mu, na ne mmienu no yɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn akyiwadeɛ.
Nnye wo nua mfɛntomu wɔ sika, aduane mfɛntomu, anaa wɔ biribiara ho.
Ɔnanani nkyɛn na gye mfɛntomu, na wo nua deɛ, nnye ne hɔ bi, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nhyira wo deɛ wode wo nsa bɛka nyinaa mu, asase a worekɔ akɔfa no so.
Sɛ wohyɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɔ a, nyɛ nyaa sɛ wobɛtua, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛhwehwɛ no wo hɔ, na adane wo bɔne.
Nanso woanhyɛ bɔ no koraa deɛ a, ɛnyɛ bɔne mma wo.
Deɛ afiri w’ano no, di so na yɛ, sɛdeɛ wofiri wo pɛ mu de w’ano ahyɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɔ no.
Sɛ woduru wo yɔnko bɔbeturom a, di aba no bi sɛdeɛ wopɛ mee, na mfa bi ngu w’adeɛ mu.
Sɛ woduru wo yɔnko ayuo a ɛgyina hɔ mu a, fa wo nsa pempane mmɛtem no bi, na mma kantankrankyi so wɔ wo yɔnko ayuo so.
Sɛ ɔbarima bi ware yerɛ, na ɛba sɛ n’ani nnye ɔbaa no ho a, ɛfiri sɛ wahunu ne ho aniwudeɛ bi a, ɛnneɛ ɔntwerɛ awaregyaeɛ nwoma mma no na ɔmfa nhyɛ ne nsa, na ɔnnya no kwan mfiri ne fie.
Na sɛ ɔfiri ne fie kɔ na ɔkɔware ɔbarima bi,
na ekunu foforɔ no nso mpɛ no, na ɔtwerɛ awaregyaeɛ nwoma ma no de hyɛ ne nsa na ɔgya no kwan firi ne fie, anaasɛ ekunu a ɔwaree no akyire yi no wu a,
ɛnneɛ ne kane kunu a ɔgyaa no kwan no nnsane mmmɛware no bio, ne ho figuo no akyi, ɛfiri sɛ ɛno yɛ AWURADE anim akyiwadeɛ, na mfa bɔne ngu asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ di soɔ no so.
Sɛ ɔbarima bi ware yerɛ foforɔ a, ɔnnkɔ ɔsa, na wɔmmfa adwuma biara nnto ne so; na ɔnne ne ho wɔ ne fie afirinhyia, na ɔne ne yere a ɔwaree no no ani nnye.
Obi nnnye oyuyammoɔ ne ne ba sɛ awowa deɛ; sɛ ɛba saa a na onii no regye nkwa sɛ awowadeɛ.
Sɛ wɔhunu obi a ɔwia ne nuanom Israelfoɔ mu nipa bie na ɔdi no nya anaasɛ ɔtɔn no a, ɛnneɛ owifoɔ no nwu; na yi bɔne no firi wo mu.
Hwɛ yie kwata yadeɛ ho, na woahwɛ ayɛ sɛdeɛ asɔfoɔ Lewifoɔ no bɛkyerɛ mo no nyinaa pɛpɛɛpɛ; sɛdeɛ mehyɛɛ wɔn no, saa na monhwɛ nyɛ.
Kae deɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn yɛɛ Miriam wɔ kwan soɔ, berɛ a mofiri Misraim reba no.
Sɛ wode biribi fɛm wo yɔnko a, nhyɛne ne dan mu nkɔgye n’awowa;
adihɔ na gyina, na onipa a wofɛm no adeɛ no mfa awowa no mmrɛ wo wɔ adihɔ.
Na sɛ ɔyɛ onipa a ɔdi hia a, mfa n’awowa no nna;
owia kɔtɔ a, dane awowa no kɔma no, na ɔmfa ne ntoma nna, na ɔnhyira wo, na ɛnyɛ wo tenenee wɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim.
Nhyɛ ɔpaani, mmɔborɔni ne ohiani a ɔfiri wo nuanom anaa ahɔhoɔ a wɔwɔ w’asase soɔ, wo nkuro mu no so.
Da a ɔyɛ adwuma no ara na ma no n’apaadeɛ, na mma owia nnkɔtɔ so, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdi hia, na ɔde n’ani ato so; na wansu amfrɛ AWURADE antia wo, na annane wo bɔne.
Wɔnnkum nananom wɔ wɔn mma bɔne so nti, na wɔnnkum mma wɔ wɔn nananom bɔne so nti; na obiara bɔne nti na wɔnku no.
Nkyea ɔhɔhoɔ anaa awisiaa atɛn, na nnye okunafoɔ atadeɛ awowa.
Na kae sɛ woyɛɛ akoa Misraim, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn gyee wo firii hɔ, enti na merehyɛ wo sɛ di asɛm yi soɔ.
Sɛ wotwa w’aduane w’afuo mu na wo werɛ firi afi bi afuo mu hɔ a, nsane nkɔfa; ma no nyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, awisiaa ne okunafoɔ deɛ, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyira wo wɔ wo nsa ano adwuma nyinaa mu.
Sɛ wopore wo ngo dua a, nsane nkɔtwee so; ma no nyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, awisiaa ne okunafoɔ deɛ.
Sɛ wote wo bobeturom aba a, nsane nkɔdi so mpɛpɛ; ma no nyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ, awisiaa ne okunafoɔ deɛ.
Na kae sɛ woyɛɛ akoa Misraim asase so; enti na merehyɛ wo sɛ di asɛm yi soɔ.
Sɛ ɔham ba nnipa mmienu ntam a, wɔmmra asɛnniiɛ, na wɔmmu wɔn atɛn, na wɔmmu ɔteneneeni bem, na wɔmmu ɔbɔnefoɔ fɔ.
Na sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ no di hweɛ a, ɔtemmufoɔ no mma no nna fam, na wɔnhwe no wɔ n’anim, dodoɔ a ɛsɛ ne bɔne no.
Mmaa aduanan na wɔnka no, ɛntra so, na wantra so anhwe no mmaa pii ansene yei, na wo nua annane w’ani so ɔhohorani.
Nkata nantwie a ɔpore ayuo ano.
Sɛ anuanom tena faako na wɔn mu baako wu na ɔnni ba a, owufoɔ no yere nnkɔ baabi nnkɔware ɔhɔhoɔ; ne kunu nua nkɔ ne ho nware no, na ɔnyɛ ekunu nua ayɛdeɛ mma no.
Na abakan a ɔbaa no bɛwo no no, wɔmfa ne nua a ɔwuiɛ no din nto no, na ne din ampepa amfiri Israel.
Na sɛ ɔbarima no mpɛ sɛ ɔware ne nua yere no a, ɛnneɛ ne nua yere no nkɔ kuro pono ano mpanimfoɔ nkyɛn nkɔka sɛ: Me kunu nua mpɛ sɛ ɔma ne nua din tena Israel, ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ me ekunu nua ayɛdeɛ.
Na ne kurom mpanimfoɔ no mfrɛ no nkasa nkyerɛ no, na sɛ ɔgyina hɔ ka sɛ: Mempɛ sɛ meware no a,
ɛnneɛ ne nua yere no ntwe mpini no mpanimfoɔ no anim, na ɔnyi ɔbarima no nan ase mpaboa, na ɔnhinam n’ani so ntasuo nka sɛ: Saa na wɔnyɛ ɔbarima a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔsiesie ne nua fie.
Na wɔmfrɛ ne fie wɔ Israel mu sɛ: Deɛ wɔayi ne nan ase mpaboa no fie.
Sɛ mmarima reko, obi ne ne nua, na ɔbaako yere twe pini sɛ ɔrebɛgye ne kunu afiri deɛ ɔrehwe no no nsam, na ɔbaa no tene ne nsa sɔ ne barima mu a,
ɛnneɛ twa ɔbaa no nsa; mma w’ani nnhu no mmɔbɔ.
Nnya abrammoɔ ahodoɔ mmienu, kɛseɛ ne ketewa, wɔ wo fotoɔ mu.
Nnya efa ahodoɔ mmienu, kɛseɛ ne ketewa, wɔ wo fie.
Nya abrammokwanmu a ɛtene, nya efa a ɛduro na ɛtene, na wo nna aware asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so.
Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn akyiwadeɛ ne wɔn a wɔyɛ yeinom nyinaa, wɔn a wɔtwa nkontompo nyinaa.
Kae deɛ Amalek yɛɛ wo kwan soɔ berɛ a mofiri Misraim reba no,
sɛdeɛ ɔbɛtoaa wo ɛkwan soɔ, berɛ a woatɔ piti na woabrɛ, na ɔtwaa wɔn a aka w’akyire no nyinaa guiɛ wɔ w’akyire, na wansuro Onyankopɔn.

Enti sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ma wo ɔhome firi w’atamfo a wɔatwa wo ho ahyia nyinaa nsa, asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ fa tena soɔ no so a, pepa Amalek nkaeɛ firi asase so; mma wo werɛ mmfi.
Na sɛ wonya duru asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema wo sɛ di soɔ no so na wofa tena so a,
fa so aduadeɛ a wobɛnya no w’asase a ɔde rema woɔ no soɔ no nyinaa so aduanekan no bi gu kɛntɛn mu, na fa kɔ faako a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛkyerɛ sɛ ne din ntena no,
na kɔ ɔsɔfoɔ a ɔwɔ so saa berɛ no nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛ no sɛ: Mepae mu nnɛ mekyerɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn sɛ maduru asase a ɔkaa yɛn nananom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma yɛn no so.
Na ɔsɔfoɔ no nnye kɛntɛn no mfiri wo nsam mfa nsi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn afɔrebukyia no anim.
Na gye so ka no AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim sɛ: Na m’agya yɛ Aramni a anka ɔkyinkyini, na ɔde nnipa kakraa bi na ɛsiane kɔɔ Misraim kɔyɛɛ hɔ hɔhoɔ, na ɔyɛɛ ɔman kɛseɛ a wɔyɛ den na wɔdɔreeɛ wɔ hɔ;
na Misraimfoɔ yɛɛ yɛn bɔne na wɔhyɛɛ yɛn so na wɔde ɔsom denden too yɛn so;
na yɛsu frɛɛ AWURADE yɛn nananom Nyankopɔn, na ɔtiee yɛn nne, na ɔhunuu yɛn mmɔborɔ a yɛyɛ, yɛn haw ne yɛn ahodwan.
Na AWURADE de nsa a ɛyɛ den ne basa a watene mu ne ahodwirideɛ akɛseɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ yii yɛn firii Misraim bae.
Na ɔde yɛn aba ha yi de asase yi ama yɛn, asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene wɔ soɔ.
Na afei, hwɛ, mede asase a wo, AWURADE, de ama me no so aduanekan maba; na fa si AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim, na sɔre n’anim,
na gye w’ani adepa a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de ama wo ne wo fie no nyinaa ho, wo ne Lewini ne ɔhɔhoɔ a ɔwɔ wo mu no.
Sɛ wowie wo nnɔbaeɛ mu ntotosoɔ du du nyinaa yiyi, afe a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa a ɛne ntotosoɔ du du ma afe no mu, na wode ama Lewini ne ɔhɔhoɔ ne awisiaa ne okunafoɔ ama wɔadi no wo kuro apono mu amee a,

ɛnneɛ ka no wɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim sɛ: Mayi akronkronneɛ afiri me fie, na mede mama Lewini ne ɔhɔhoɔ ne awisiaa ne okunafoɔ nso, sɛdeɛ wo mmara a woahyɛ me no nyinaa teɛ, mamfom wo mmara nsɛm no na me werɛ amfi;
mennii bi m’awerɛhoɔ mu, na menyii bi berɛ a me ho nteɛ, na memfaa bi memmaa owufoɔ biara. Matie AWURADE me Nyankopɔn nne, na mayɛ sɛdeɛ woahyɛ me no nyinaa.
Firi wo tenabea kronkron ɔsoro brɛ w’ani ase hwɛ, na hyira wo man Israel ne asase a wode ama yɛn, sɛdeɛ wokaa yɛn nananom ntam no, asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene wɔ soɔ.
Ɛnnɛ da yi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn rehyɛ wo sɛ: Yɛ ahyɛdeɛ ne atemmudeɛ yi, na fa w’akoma ne wo kra nyinaa di so na yɛ.
Ɛnnɛ woaka no AWURADE ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ wo Nyankopɔn, na woanante n’akwan so, na woadi n’ahyɛdeɛ ne ne mmara nsɛm ne n’atemmudeɛ so, na woatie ne nne.
Na AWURADE nso aka no wo ho nnɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ ɔno ara ne man, sɛdeɛ wahyɛ wo bɔ no, na woadi ne mmara nsɛm nyinaa so,
na wama wo so akyɛne amanaman a ɔyɛɛ wɔn no nyinaa, de wo ayɛ ayeyie ne din ne animuonyam, na woayɛ ɔman kronkron ama AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn sɛdeɛ ɔkaeɛ no.
Na Mose ne Israel mpanimfoɔ no hyɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: Monni mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi nyinaa so.
Na da a mobɛtwa Yordan akɔ asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no soɔ no, fa aboɔ akɛseɛ sisi hɔ, na fa akaadoo sra ho,
